scn PrimmDeputyScript
; This on activate block as well as the onDeath blocks are in both PrimmDeputyScript as well as PrimmResidentScript ; Be sure to change both for the sheriff quest to function
int doOnce int GMOnce ref SpeakingCitizen int NoteNum int Waiting int iFirstSpawn
begin OnLoad if iFirstSpawn == 0 set nVPrimmDeputyConv.iPrimmResidentCount to nVPrimmDeputyConv.iPrimmResidentCount +1 set iFirstSpawn to 1 setrestrained 1 endif end
;begin onActivate ; if getActionRef == player && nVPrimmDeputyConv.PetitionActive == 1 ; set nVPrimmDeputyConv.SpeakingCitizen to getSelf ; endif ; Activate ;end
begin GameMode if GetInFaction PrimmPetitionFaction == 0 && GMOnce == 0 set GMOnce to 1 removenote PrimmSheriffPetition0 removenote PrimmSheriffPetition1 removenote PrimmSheriffPetition2 removenote PrimmSheriffPetition3 removenote PrimmSheriffPetition4 set NoteNum to nvPrimmDeputyConv.NoteNumber if NoteNum == 0 addnote PrimmSheriffPetition1 set nvPrimmDeputyConv.NoteNumber to 1 elseif NoteNum == 1 addnote PrimmSheriffPetition2 set nvPrimmDeputyConv.NoteNumber to 2 elseif NoteNum == 2 addnote PrimmSheriffPetition3 set nvPrimmDeputyConv.NoteNumber to 3 elseif NoteNum == 3 addnote PrimmSheriffPetition4 set nvPrimmDeputyConv.NoteNumber to 4 elseif NoteNum == 4 addnote PrimmSheriffPetition5 set nvPrimmDeputyConv.NoteNumber to 5 set nVPrimmDeputyConv.PetitionActive to 2 setobjectivedisplayed nvPrimmDeputyConv 47 1 setobjectivecompleted nvPrimmDeputyConv 45 1 endif endif end
begin onLoad if nVPrimmDeputyConv.BeagleCaptured == 2 && doOnce == 0 PrimmDeputyRef.RemoveFromFaction RaiderFaction set doOnce to 1 endif end
begin onDeath set nVPrimmDeputyConv.DeadCitizenCount to nVPrimmDeputyConv.DeadCitizenCount + 1 if nVPrimmDeputyConv.iPrimmResidentCount == nVPrimmDeputyConv.DeadCitizenCount set VStoryEventPrimm to 2 endif if GetQuestCompleted VCG01 if GetObjectiveCompleted VMQ01 34 == 0 && GetObjectiveDisplayed VMQ01 40 == 0 && VMQ01.bPrimmClosed == 0 setobjectivedisplayed VMQ01 34 0 setobjectivedisplayed VMQ01 36 1 endif endif end

scn PrimmResidentScript
; This on activate block as well as the onDeath blocks are in both PrimmDeputyScript as well as PrimmResidentScript ; Be sure to change both for the sheriff quest to function
int onceonly int GMOnce ref SpeakingCitizen int NoteNum int iFirstSpawn
begin OnLoad if iFirstSpawn == 0 set nVPrimmDeputyConv.iPrimmResidentCount to nVPrimmDeputyConv.iPrimmResidentCount +1 set iFirstSpawn to 1 endif end
begin onActivate if getActionRef == player && nVPrimmDeputyConv.PetitionActive == 1 && OnceOnly == 0 set SpeakingCitizen to GetSelf set nVPrimmDeputyConv.SpeakingCitizen to SpeakingCitizen set OnceOnly to 1 endif Activate end
begin GameMode if GetInFaction PrimmPetitionFaction == 0 && GMOnce == 0 set GMOnce to 1 removenote PrimmSheriffPetition0 removenote PrimmSheriffPetition1 removenote PrimmSheriffPetition2 removenote PrimmSheriffPetition3 removenote PrimmSheriffPetition4 set NoteNum to nvPrimmDeputyConv.NoteNumber if NoteNum == 0 addnote PrimmSheriffPetition1 set nvPrimmDeputyConv.NoteNumber to 1 elseif NoteNum == 1 addnote PrimmSheriffPetition2 set nvPrimmDeputyConv.NoteNumber to 2 elseif NoteNum == 2 addnote PrimmSheriffPetition3 set nvPrimmDeputyConv.NoteNumber to 3 elseif NoteNum == 3 addnote PrimmSheriffPetition4 set nvPrimmDeputyConv.NoteNumber to 4 elseif NoteNum == 4 addnote PrimmSheriffPetition5 set nvPrimmDeputyConv.NoteNumber to 5 set nVPrimmDeputyConv.PetitionActive to 2 setobjectivedisplayed nvPrimmDeputyConv 47 1 setobjectivecompleted nvPrimmDeputyConv 45 1 endif endif end
begin onDeath set nVPrimmDeputyConv.DeadCitizenCount to nVPrimmDeputyConv.DeadCitizenCount + 1 if nVPrimmDeputyConv.iPrimmResidentCount == nVPrimmDeputyConv.DeadCitizenCount set VStoryEventPrimm to 2 endif if GetIsId PrimmJohnsonNash showmessage PrimmNashDead if getquestcompleted VCG01 if GetObjectiveDisplayed VMQ01 34 == 0 if GetObjectiveDisplayed VMQ01 36 == 0 && VMQ01.bPrimmClosed == 0 setObjectiveDisplayed VMQ01 34 1 endif if GetObjectiveCompleted VMQ01 30 == 0 setobjectiveCompleted VMQ01 30 1 endif endif endif endif end

scn V03ControlPodScript
short mode ref myLink int V3State
begin onActivate if IsActionRef player == 1 set V3State to VMS07.iVault3Entrance set myLink to getLinkedRef ;the linked ref should be the door. if ((myLink.getOpenState == 3) || (myLink.getOpenState == 1)) && mode != 2 ;door closed or open playgroup Forward 0 ;pull handle out set mode to 2 activate myLink ;activate all the things that this is an activate parent of - klaxon light and activator. if ALTBackground != 23 if player.GetInCell Vault3a == 0 && V3State == 2 setAlly PlayerFaction FiendsFactionNV ;showwarning "Making player an ally of fiend faction" else setEnemy PlayerFaction FiendsFactionNV ;showwarning "Making Player an enemy of fiend faction" endif endif endif endif end
begin gameMode
if (mode == 2) if (isAnimPlaying == 0) set myLink to getLinkedRef ;the linked ref should be the door. playgroup Left 1 ;pull handle down set mode to 3 myLink.activate player endif endif
end

scn VES01VictorGSMyBodyguardScript
; This script handles the robot Victor when the Player is in danger from random encounters near Goodsprings ; Victor will show up and help the Player defeat their enemies and then initiate a short dialogue with the Player ; Afterwards Victor will return to his "home" in Goodsprings
int nVictorAttack ; 1 = Victor has attacked an enemy of the Player int nVictorArrived ; 1 = Victor has arrived and is helping the Player int nVictorTalk ; 1 = Victor has talked to the Player int nVictorTryTalk ; 1 = Victor is currently pathing to Player to begin dialogue (and hoping a fight doesn't break out before he gets there) int nCombatDone ; 1 = Victor and Player have fought and defeated all immediate enemies (the threat is over)
begin GameMode if GetQuestCompleted VCG01 == 0 return ; This check is essentially the "off switch" --> when nVictorTalk equals 1 the "GoHome" package is added ; The "GoHome" package stops the quest when it completes
elseif nVictorTalk == 1 && nVictorAttack != 1 ; if Victor has already talked to Player (and is not attacking) then stop the quest GSVictorRef.RemoveScriptPackage VES01VictorGSTalkToPCPackage ; After Victor talks to Player "nVictorTalk" is set to 1 (which is the only time this "if" will be true) so remove package GSVictorRef.AddScriptPackage VES01VictorGSGoHomePackage ; <<<This loops to ensure Victor makes it home -- REMOVE WHEN PATHING/NAVMESH FIXED>>> ; NOTE: MyBodyguard Quest is stopped at the end of GoHome Package (added above and at end of TalkToPC Package)
; --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; This check is waiting for the Player to both "be in combat" and "be at half health" --> then Victor arrives to save the day! ; (There are suplimental checks to make sure the Player is near Goodsprings and not fighting quest-specific enemies)
elseif nVictorTalk != 1 && nVictorAttack != 1 && nVictorArrived != 1 ; If Victor isn't talking or attacking and hasn't arrived yet if player.IsInCombat == 1 && player.GetHealthPercentage <= 0.50 ; <<<A FIGHT IS ON AND PLAYER IS HURTING>>>
if player.GetDistance VES01VictorsRescueRangeCenter <= 27840 ; If Player is near Goodsprings (don't have Victor come help if Player is too far away)
; The next four checks (if and elseif (x3)) are to ensure Victor doesn't show up during Sunny's "Back in the Saddle" quest or... ; ...the Powder Ganger shoot-out in Goodsprings (checks for all specific creatures/enemies from those events)
if ( GetQuestRunning VCG02 != 1 && EasyPeteRef.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && GoodspringsSettler01Ref.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && GoodspringsSettler02Ref.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && GoodspringsSettler03Ref.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && GoodspringsSettler04Ref.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && VCG02GSSettlerREF.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && GSJoeCobbRef.GetCombatTarget != playerREF ) if GSPG01Ref.GetIsAlerted != 1 && GSPG02Ref.GetIsAlerted != 1 && GSPG03Ref.GetIsAlerted != 1 && GSPG04Ref.GetIsAlerted != 1 && GSPG05Ref.GetIsAlerted != 1 && GSPG06Ref.GetIsAlerted != 1 && VCG02Gecko1REF.GetIsAlerted != 1 && VCG02Gecko2REF.GetIsAlerted != 1 && VFreeformGoodspringsWell2Gecko1REF.GetIsAlerted != 1 && GSBighorner01Ref.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && GSBighorner02Ref.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && GSBighorner03Ref.GetCombatTarget != playerREF if VFreeformGoodspringsWell2Gecko2REF.GetIsAlerted != 1 && VFreeformGoodspringsWell2Gecko3REF.GetIsAlerted != 1 && VFreeformGoodspringsWell3Gecko1REF.GetIsAlerted != 1 && VFreeformGoodspringsWell3Gecko2REF.GetIsAlerted != 1 && VFreeformGoodspringsWell3Gecko3REF.GetIsAlerted != 1 && vGSBrahmin01Ref.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && vGSBrahmin02Ref.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && vGSBrahmin03Ref.GetCombatTarget != playerREF if GSPG01Ref.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && GSPG02Ref.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && GSPG03Ref.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && GSPG04Ref.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && GSPG05Ref.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && GSPG06Ref.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && VCG02Gecko1REF.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && VCG02Gecko2REF.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && VFreeformGoodspringsWell2Gecko1REF.GetCombatTarget != playerREF if VFreeformGoodspringsWell2Gecko2REF.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && VFreeformGoodspringsWell2Gecko3REF.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && VFreeformGoodspringsWell3Gecko1REF.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && VFreeformGoodspringsWell3Gecko2REF.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && VFreeformGoodspringsWell3Gecko3REF.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && SunnyRef.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && TrudyRef.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && DocMitchellREF.GetCombatTarget != playerREF && CheyenneREF.GetCombatTarget != playerREF
if player.GetDistance GSVictorRef >= 10000 GSVictorRef.MoveTo Player 2500 2500 GSVictorRef.AddScriptPackage VES01VictorGSPathToPCPackage ;GSVictorRef.SetPlayerTeammate 1 ; Victor will now fight with the Player (and enemies will attack Victor) GSVictorRef.AddToFaction VESVictorMyBodyguardFaction 1 set nVictorAttack to 1 ; Victor is close to the Player and the Player is in combat so Victor is attacking (has attacked) too set nVictorArrived to 1 ; Victor has arrived else GSVictorRef.AddScriptPackage VES01VictorGSPathToPCPackage if GSVictorRef.GetDistance player <= 1000 ;GSVictorRef.SetPlayerTeammate 1 ; Victor will now fight with the Player (and enemies will attack Victor) GSVictorRef.AddToFaction VESVictorMyBodyguardFaction 1 set nVictorAttack to 1 ; Victor is now close enough to the Player to see enemies so Victor is attacking (has attacked) too set nVictorArrived to 1 ; Victor has arrived endif endif
endif endif endif endif endif
endif endif
; --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
; This check is waiting for the Player to "be out of combat" before sending Victor to talk to the Player ; Victor's other actions (to "Go Home") are handled in the dialogue "VES01VictorGSMyBodyguard" ; (There is also a check to make sure combat doesn't start again before Victor begins dialogue -- Victor will return to combat if this happens)
elseif nVictorTalk != 1 && nVictorAttack == 1 ; if Victor has not talked to Player and is attacking (has attacked) if player.IsInCombat == 0 ; keeps checking to see when the Player is done with the fight set nCombatDone to 1 ; <<<THE FIGHT IS OVER>>> if nCombatDone == 1 && nVictorTalk != 1 && nVictorTryTalk != 1 ; if the fight is over and Victor has not talked to Player...and is not trying currently to reach the Player to talk ; Start Package that sends Victor to talk to the Player GSVictorRef.RemoveFromFaction VESVictorMyBodyguardFaction ; Added as part of a fix for issue# 52147. (11_15_10) -ETB GSVictorRef.AddScriptPackage VES01VictorGSTalkToPCPackage set nVictorTryTalk to 1 if player.IsInCombat == 1 ; if while Victor is trying to talk to the Player and combat begins (again) stop trying to talk and fight enemies! set nCombatDone to 0 ; <<<A NEW FIGHT HAS BEGUN>>> set nVictorTalk to 0 set nVictorTryTalk to 0 GSVictorRef.RemoveScriptPackage VES01VictorGSTalkToPCPackage ; <<<THE FOLLOWING ARE ADDED TO END OF VICTORS FINAL DIALOGUE (result of "VES01VictorGSTalkToPC Package" above)>>> ; GSVictorRef.SetPlayerTeammate 0 ; GSVictorRef.RemoveScriptPackage VES01VictorGSTalkToPCPackage ; GSVictorRef.AddScriptPackage VES01VictorGSGoHomePackage ; set VES01VictorGSMyBodyguard.nVictorTalk to 1 ; set VES01VictorGSMyBodyguard.nVictorAttack to 0 endif endif endif endif
end

else
Activate
endif
end

scn VMS21aJoanaFleeTheStripTrigger2 ; - Jorge
short bGoodspringsVictorDisabled
Begin OnTriggerEnter VMS21JoanaREF
VMS21JoanaREF.AddScriptPackage VMS21aJoanaEscapeToOutside03 VMS21aJoanaFriend01REF.AddScriptPackage VMS21aJoanaEscapeToOutside03 VMS21aJoanaFriend02REF.AddScriptPackage VMS21aJoanaEscapeToOutside03
VMS21JoanaREF.MoveToMarkerWithFade VFSTouristDestinationMarkerREF VMS21aJoanaFriend01REF.MoveToMarkerWithFade VFSTouristDestinationMarkerREF VMS21aJoanaFriend02REF.MoveToMarkerWithFade VFSTouristDestinationMarkerREF
End

scn VES01aVictorInNovacQuestSCRIPT
; Detects when Player is in region "vMapVictorInNovacRegion" then moves "GSVictorRef" from Goodsprings to Novac and updates his dialogue
Ref VictorInNovacRef
Short bVictorInNovac ; Set to 1 when Victor is moved to Novac (reset to 0 when Victor leaves Novac). Short bButterMyButt ; Used by Victor's dialogue so he only gives his distinctive "butter my butt" hello the first time.
Begin GameMode
If ( GetGlobalValue vStoryState < 10 && GetStage VMQTops <= 30 && VES01bVictorInBoulder.bVictorMoved == 0 ) && GetQuestCompleted VCG01 ; (11_7_10) Added for bug# 45693 -ETB If ( IsPlayerInRegion vMapVictorInNovacRegion == 1 ) If ( bVictorInNovac == 0 ) If ( GSVictorRef.GetDead == 1 ) ; (11_13_10) Added for bug# 39835 -ETB GSVictorRef.Resurrect ; <<< Endif ; <<< GSVictorRef.MoveTo VES05VictorInNovacMarkerRef Set VFreeformGoodsprings.bVictorPatrol to 0 ; (10_30_10) Set to 0 to shutdown Victor's internal package "VGSVictorCircuitPatrol" -ETB GSVictorRef.AddScriptPackage VES01aVictorNovacGoHomePackage GSVictorRef.ResetAI ; (10_28_10) Added to keep Victor from wandering back to Goodsprings. -ETB Set bVictorInNovac to 1 If ( GetObjectiveCompleted VMQ01 25 != 1 ) ; (10_28_10) Added to shut-down "Talk to Victor in Goodsprings about your rescue." objective. SetObjectiveDisplayed VMQ01 25 0 ; <<< Endif ; <<< -ETB Endif ; Ending Check "IsPlayerInRegion vMapVictorInNovacRegion == 1" Endif ; Ending Check "bVictorInNovac == 0"
If ( bVictorInNovac == 1 ) ; (10_28_10) Added to keep Victor from wandering back to Goodsprings. -ETB If ( GSVictorRef.GetDistance VES05VictorInNovacMarkerRef >= 100 ) ; <<< Set VFreeformGoodsprings.bVictorPatrol to 0 ; <<< (10_30_10) GSVictorRef.AddScriptPackage VES01aVictorNovacGoHomePackage ; <<< GSVictorRef.ResetAI ; <<< Endif ; <<< Endif ; <<< Endif ; <<< End (11_7_10) Added for bug# 45693 End

scn VES01bVictorInBoulderQuestSCRIPT
; When the Player reaches Boulder City and "deals" with Jessup (finishes VMQ01 "They Went That-A-Way" quest), Victor rolls up and talks to the Player about what to do next... ; ... Then Victor rolls out to Freeside to delete himself at the North Gate (of Freeside).
Short bVictorDoneTalking Short bVictorMoved
Short iCount
Begin GameMode
If ( GetStageDone VMS20 100 == 1 && GetStage VMQTops <= 30 ) && GetQuestCompleted VCG01 If ( IsPlayerInRegion vMapOuterBoulderRegion == 1 && IsPlayerInRegion vMapInnerBoulderRegion == 0 ) If ( player.IsInCombat != 1 ) SetQuestDelay VES01bVictorInBoulder 0.1 Endif Endif ; End "InRegion" check (we want Victor to reach the Player even if the Player moves out of region now).
If ( bVictorMoved == 0 )
If ( iCount == 0 ) If ( GSVictorRef.GetDead == 1 ) GSVictorRef.ResurrectActor 0 Endif Set iCount to 1 Return Elseif ( iCount == 1 ) GSVictorRef.MoveTo VES01bVictorInBoulderMARKER Set iCount to 2 Return Elseif ( iCount == 2 ) GSVictorRef.AddScriptPackage VEFR02NCRBad2TalkToPlayer ; Borrowing "TalkToPlayer" package from NCRBad2 quest. Set bVictorMoved to 1 ; [NOTE: This is used as a conditional for Victor's quest dialogue.] Set iCount to 3 Endif
Endif
If ( bVictorMoved == 1 && bVictorDoneTalking == 1 ) ; [NOTE: bVictorDoneTalking is set to 1 in his dialogue.] Set bVictorDoneTalking to 0 SetQuestDelay VES01bVictorInBoulder 5.0 GSVictorRef.AddScriptPackage VES01bVictorFreesideToDeletePackage Endif Endif
End

Scn VFactionSquadMasterSCRIPT
; This script handles variables, and some operations, for the hit-squad features of NV (Legion, and NCR). ; - Jorge (5/16/11)
; Squad Origin, and Marker, variables:
Ref rBox01 ; These refs store the RefID of the spawner-boxes placed in the world. The spawner-boxes are just Trigger Volumes that run GameMode code. They are always out of player reach. Ref rBox02 Ref rBox03 Ref rBox04 Ref rBox05 Ref rBox06 Ref rBox07 Ref rBox08 Ref rBox09 Ref rBox10 Ref rBox11 Ref rBox12 Ref rBox13 Ref rBox14 Ref rBox15 Ref rBox16 Ref rBox17 Ref rBox18 Ref rBox19 Ref rBox20 Ref rBox21 Ref rBox22 Ref rBox23 Ref rBox24 Ref rBox25 Ref rSquadBox ; This ref is the Trigger Volume that stores the Encounter List Script (VFactionSquadListCodeHolderSCRIPT). It's code is used to store hit squad encounters, and associate them to refs used by spawner-boxes. ; Note, these refs are called from this quest script, often. The purpose of this script is to organize operations between "codeboxes" so that efficient cleaning, and spawning, of actors occurs. ; The method of communication between these refs to the quest is through variable value setting. The quest changes the operations of the boxes' refs through EnterTrigger calls, AND variable value setting.
; Squad Stage, Frequency, Type, Origin, and Control, variables:
Float fRange ; Range to Player ref at which codeboxes start to run checks to see if they must spawn squads. Float fSpawnTime ; Time at which the last squad spawned. More than 24 hours need to pass for squads to re-appear (condition for bSquadOn to be 1). Float fNCRWarnTime ; Time tracking variable to determine days to wait before setting NCR squad to turn hostile on sight when rep is low enough.
Short bNoSquad ; 1 = Master check to turn on/off all squad-related scripting operations, and AI Package checks. Short bNCRHit ; 1 = Player has become vilified by the NCR, at some point in their adventuring. Short bLegionHit ; 1 = Player has become vilified by the Legion, at some point in their adventuring. Short bSquadHit ; 1 = Player has become vilified by the NCR, or the Legion, at some point in their adventuring. Short bSquadOn ; 1 = Checks that condition the appearance of squads have returned true. Short bSquadChosen ; 1 = The encounter list activator is done selecting the squad to spawn, and associating the NPCs to the newest active spawner-box. Short bSquadCleanUp ; To control the disabling of squads' references (Actors) upon an activate/trigger call. Short bSquadFirst ; 1 = First faction offense occurs, and we use this to set off a one-day timer before squads begin showing up.
Int iSquadEnd ; This var controls the states happening while this quest script is not busy with spawning operations. Here are the possible states: ; 0 = Most general state, here we're calculating whether faction squad master switches are on, or off, based on reputation, faction amnesties, and squad dialogues. ; 1 = Called from a spawner-box that detects three things, mainly: A- Hit squad switches are ON; B- Player is in spawning range; C- Another spawner-box is active. ; When value is 1, this quest script will force the last active spawner-box to disable (clean) its actors, and return its state to "dormant, but ready to spawn dudes if necessary." ; 2 = Legacy value, here present in case we, or modders, want to change the system to handle two active spawner-boxes at a time (as it's the case in NVDLC02, and NVDLC03).
Int iSquadOne ; This value can vary, and represents the randomized result of operations ran at the end of this script. The resulting value is used by the encounter list script to select a squad to spawn by a querying spawner-box. Int iSquadTwo ; Legacy value. Again, used in NVDLC02, and NVDLC03, to keep two spawner-boxes going at the same time. I left it here for future, or modder, use. Int iSquadState ; This var divides the functions of this quest script in two distinct areas of operation: 0 = initial setup, and hit squad master switches' state. 1 = spawning operations (randomizing encounter, directing boxes, etc). Int iSquadNumber ; This var tracks the amount of active encounters (squads). That is, it tracks the amount of spawner-boxes that are active. This is used by spawner boxes to tell this script whether to spawn, or clean, encounters. Int iSquadSpawns ; This var tracks the number of actors used by a given spawn. It's used by the spawner-boxes so that they know how many actors they need to move, enable, disable, etc. It gets set in the encounter list script.
Int iBoxCall ; 1 - 25, to know which box is making the call to start culling creatures from other boxes, if the squad limit has been reached (not used here, since it's most useful when more than one spawner-box can be active). Ref rBoxSpawn ; This ref is the newest active spawner-box. That is, it's the box that calls for either cleaning operations of other boxes, or for encounter selection operations before it can spawn stuff. Ref rBoxOne ; This ref is also the newest active spawner-box. However, it's distinguished from rBoxSpawn for cases where we want to keep more than one active spawner-box at a time (NVDLC02, and NVDLC03). Ref rBoxTwo ; This ref is usually the last active spawner-box. It's not used here, but in NVDLC02, and NVDLC03, it gets set to rBoxOne value whenever a new box asks to spawn things. ; rBoxTwo's purpose is to refer to the spawner-box farthest away from the Player. That way, we always clean up far away encounters when new spawner-boxes query for spawning permission.
; Operational Variables:
Short bSetup ; Runs only once, to make sure we've set proper values used by the scripts of this system. It also sets the refs of the spawner-boxes in the world (the ref IDs of the Trigger Volumes that act as spawner-boxes). Int iCount ; Operational var. This one is used only to separate operations within a given set of larger checks. It's purpose is to skip calls that only need to run once, until parts of the system are ready for them to run again. Int iSquadRand ; This var receives its value from randomized operations. These operations are used to vary the types of encounters chosen. Primarily used in NVDLC02, and NVDLC03, but left here for potential uses.
;>>>>>------------------------------------------------- Begin GameMode
If (bNoSquad == 0) If (iSquadState == 0) If (bSetup == 0) Set rBox01 to VFactionSquadBox01REF; Set rBox02 to VFactionSquadBox02REF; Set rBox03 to VFactionSquadBox03REF; Set rBox04 to VFactionSquadBox04REF; Set rBox05 to VFactionSquadBox05REF; Set rBox06 to VFactionSquadBox06REF; Set rBox07 to VFactionSquadBox07REF; Set rBox08 to VFactionSquadBox08REF; Set rBox09 to VFactionSquadBox09REF; Set rBox10 to VFactionSquadBox10REF; Set rBox11 to VFactionSquadBox11REF; Set rBox12 to VFactionSquadBox12REF; Set rBox13 to VFactionSquadBox13REF; Set rBox14 to VFactionSquadBox14REF; Set rBox15 to VFactionSquadBox15REF; Set rBox16 to VFactionSquadBox16REF; Set rBox17 to VFactionSquadBox17REF; Set rBox18 to VFactionSquadBox18REF; Set rBox19 to VFactionSquadBox19REF; Set rBox20 to VFactionSquadBox20REF; Set rBox21 to VFactionSquadBox21REF; Set rBox22 to VFactionSquadBox22REF; Set rBox23 to VFactionSquadBox23REF; Set rBox24 to VFactionSquadBox24REF; Set rBox25 to VFactionSquadBox25REF; Set rSquadBox to VFactionSquadBox; Set fRange to 8000; Set bSetup to 1; Else If (iSquadEnd == 0) ; Note that iSquadEnd's value changes by action of spawner-boxes, when they detect that associated NPC cleanup needs to happen. If (bSquadHit == 0) ; This variable is a master switch for hit squads appearances, but it also makes spawner-boxes run fewer checks. If (GetReputationThreshold RepNVCaesarsLegion 2 >= 5 || GetReputationThreshold RepNVNCR 2 >= 5) ; If any rep in question goes to bad, then we start a counter after which to turn on spawner-boxes. If (bSquadFirst == 0) ; If it's the first time that the Player gets into trouble with either of the factions (Legion, or NCR). Set fSpawnTime to GameDaysPassed; ; Then we kickstart a one-day timer before unleashing the squads. Set bSquadFirst to 1; ; Note, this will happen only one time. If players piss off the remaining faction then their squads will begin appearing at the next timer cycle. Elseif (bSquadFirst == 1) ; If the Player has gotten in trouble with a faction, and the timer value has been set, then we begin to check for its completion. If (GameDaysPassed >= (fSpawnTime + 1)); ; fSpawnTime gets set to GameDaysPassed after a spawner-box spawns the chosen hit squad NPCs. Set bSquadHit to 1; ; Note, we change bSquadHit to 0 whenever an encounter is successfully spawned, but if not met, or attacked, we change fSpawnTime to 0. If (VEFR02NCRBad2MostWanted.bThugsDoneTalking == 1) ; Doing so forces a new squad to appear whenever the Player enters a new spawner-box without having to wait 1 day in between. Set VEFR02NCRBad2MostWanted.bThugsDoneTalking to 0; ; We set this var to 0 for respawns, which now controls the EVP calculations done by spawner-boxes, when players leave their active range. Endif Else If (iSquadNumber >= 1) ; If It's not time to spawn a new squad, but squads are already active. If (Player.GetInWorldspace WastelandNV != 1 || Player.GetDistance rBoxSpawn >= 20000) ; If the Player leaves WastelandNV, or the distance to the active spawner-box is too great for "comfort." SetQuestDelay VFactionSquad 0.1; ; Then we set a high update time for the script, and turn the var that controls "squad clean-up" mode. Set iSquadEnd to 1; ; Here we work in the same way as if a new spawner-box asked the master script to clean up old squads to let it spawn its own. Return; ; The difference lies in that clean-up is usually requested by spawner-boxes, and not checked for in the Master Script. Endif Endif Endif Endif Endif Else ; Else, hit-squads are now active, calculated for either type (Legion, or NCR). If (bNCRHit == 0 && bLegionHit == 0) ; If hit squads toggles have been turned off, due to proper circumstances (checks, below), then toggle off master switch. Set bSquadHit to 0; Return; Elseif (bNCRHit == 0 && bLegionHit == 1) ; For Legion, we simply check reputation threshold, since there's no special squad dialogue involved in amnesty. If (GetReputationThreshold RepNVCaesarsLegion 2 < 5) Set bLegionHit to 0; Endif Else ; This else governs all cases where NCR hit squad switch has been toggled on (this happens in the encounter selection script). If (GetReputationThreshold RepNVCaesarsLegion 2 < 5) ; We run the Legion check again, since it's possible to be enemies of both at the same time. Set bLegionHit to 0; Endif If (GetReputationThreshold RepNVNCR 2 < 5 && VEFR02NCRBad2MostWanted.bFirstTalk == 1 && VEFR02NCRBad2MostWanted.bDoneOnLeashTalking == 0) ; This check pertains the dialogue given by NCR hit squad leader after amnesty. Set VEFR02NCRBad2MostWanted.iDeathThreat to 333; ; Value here is checked in the NCR hit squad leader's dialogue. SetAlly VEFR02NCRHitSquadFactionNV PlayerFaction; ; Just to be sure, we make the NCR hit squad friendly to player. Set iSquadOne to 1; ; To force the NCR to appear when spawner-boxes query for spawning, we pre-select encounter 1, which is an NCR hit squad. Set bSquadChosen to 1; ; We set bSquadChosen to 0, just to make sure the encounter list script does its thing with the provided encounter number (1, above). Set iCount to 1; ; We set the proper operational variable to 1, which this code expects (below) before asking the encounter codebox to organize the squad. Return; ; We skip code on ISquadEnd == 0 bracket, until bDoneOnLeashTalking turns to 1 (after NCR leader gives proper dialogue line). Elseif (GetReputationThreshold RepNVNCR 2 < 5) ; Else, if Rep has been fixed, but NCR hit squad has never made contact (bFirstTalk), or OnLeashTalking == 1, then toggle NCR switch off. Set bNCRHit to 0; ; We toggle NCR switch off, but allow for one more check before starting cycle again. If (VEFR02NCRBad2MostWanted.bDoneOnLeashTalking == 1) ; If NCR hit squad has just finished first dialogue after amnesty, then we tap into a variable checked in their other lines, which forces combat. Set VEFR02NCRBad2MostWanted.bBadAgain to 1; ; This means that if amnesty has been granted, and player has been contacted by hit squads, combat will ensue afterward if rep falls again. Endif Return; Else ; If NCR rep continues to be bad, after the NCR hit squad switch has been turned on, then we run regular checks for warning times, etc. If (VEFR02NCRBad2MostWanted.bWarnings == 1) ; If this var is 1, that means that the grace period given by NCR after they start hunting the Player is now over, so we skip redundant operations. Return; Else ; Else, run timer checks to determine when it's pertinent to switch dialogue lines of NCR hit squad leader. These are the warning-line checks. If (fNCRWarnTime <= 0) ; If a warning timer has never been set yet, then we check for variable that indicates NCR hit squad leader has made contact. If (VEFR02NCRBad2MostWanted.bFirstTalk == 1) ; This var gets set to 1 the first time that the NCR hit squad initiates dialogue with a hated player. Set fNCRWarnTime to GameDaysPassed; ; We set the timer variable to the current time. Return; Endif Else ; If the warning timer has been set, then we check the days passed since the moment of first contact between NCR hit squad, and Player. If (GameDaysPassed >= (fNCRWarnTime + 4)) ; If over three full days passed since last contact, then we up threat level to maximum, and the hit squad faction enemy to the Player. Set VEFR02NCRBad2MostWanted.iDeathThreat to 4; ; This var is checked on the NCR hit squad leader's dialogue. 4 = gonna kick your ass, pretty much. It changes to 5 thereafter (in dialogue). SetEnemy VEFR02NCRHitSquadFactionNV PlayerFaction; ; We make the factions be enemies, so that combat, and detection of hostiles, is handled automatically. Set VEFR02NCRBad2MostWanted.bWarnings to 1; ; We set this var to 1, so that the script ignores all warning timer operations (to save processing time). Return; Elseif (GameDaysPassed >= (fNCRWarnTime + 3)) ; levels 3, 2, and 1, correspond to warning lines given by the NCR hit squad leader, who reminds the Player about the time left before the hunt. Set VEFR02NCRBad2MostWanted.iDeathThreat to 3; Return; Elseif (GameDaysPassed >= (fNCRWarnTime + 2)) Set VEFR02NCRBad2MostWanted.iDeathThreat to 2; Return; Elseif (GameDaysPassed >= (fNCRWarnTime + 1)) Set VEFR02NCRBad2MostWanted.iDeathThreat to 1; Endif Endif Endif Endif Endif Endif Elseif (iSquadEnd == 1) ; This var gets set to 1 whenever a spawner-box detects that a player is within spawning range, and that another spawnerbox is active. Set bSquadCleanUp to 1; ; This var gets checked by the spawnerbox, in its TriggerEnter block - this block has two settings: cleanup spawner-box spawns, or spawn them. Set iSquadEnd to 3; ; We set this back to 0 at the spawner-box, whenever it's done cleaning its associated spawns. ;rBoxTwo.EnterTrigger Player; ; Legacy-line, since the original system cleaned the oldest active spawner-box, rather than the most recently active. rBoxOne.EnterTrigger Player; ; We call a TriggerEnter event on rBoxOne, which is the only active box in this system, to clean its spawns. Elseif (iSquadEnd == 2) ; This option is left-over from the setup I wrote for DLC02, and DLC03, where more than one spawner-box could be active at a time. Set bSquadCleanUp to 1; ; In this case, we'd clean both active spawner-boxes - again, this is legacy. Set iSquadEnd to 3; rBoxTwo.EnterTrigger Player; ; We call a TriggerEnter event on rBoxOne, and rBoxTwo to clean their spawns. rBoxOne.EnterTrigger Player; Endif Endif Elseif (iSquadState == 1) ; This var gets set to 1 only by a spawner-box, when it detects the Player within spawning range, hit squads are on, and no other box is active. If (bSquadChosen == 0) ; The squad-chosen var gets set to 1 in the encounter list script, once it has selected the actors to spawn by the newest active spawner-box. If (iCount == 0) ; This is a mere operational var, to separate the calculations within this bracket. If (GetReputationThreshold RepNVCaesarsLegion 2 >= 5 && GetReputationThreshold RepNVNCR 2 >= 5) ; Note: here we calculate what kinds of hit squads to spawn. This is based on player reputation checks, and NOT on bNCRHit, or bLegionHit. Set iSquadRand to (1 + (GetRandomPercent * (4) / 100)); ; The reason is simple: cases where we want to spawn hit-squads even if rep is below danger level, but only after danger level has been hit. Set iSquadOne to iSquadRand; ; The clearest example of this is the NCR amnesty, and the NCR hit squad dialogue related to it. Set iCount to 1; ; Aaaaanyway, we've just calculated a hit squad encounter based on four possible templates. First check calculates for both Legion, and NCR. Return; Elseif (GetReputationThreshold RepNVCaesarsLegion 2 >= 5 && GetReputationThreshold RepNVNCR 2 < 5) ; Else, if Legion rep is at danger level, but NCR rep is at good level, then we spawn only Legion dudes. Set iSquadRand to (3 + (GetRandomPercent * (2) / 100)); ; We randomize between encounters 3, and 4, in the encounter list script (VFactionSquadListSCRIPT). Set iSquadOne to iSquadRand; ; ISquadOne becomes the randomized number we got, and that's what the encounter list script uses to determine which actors to select. Set iCount to 1; ; We switch the operational var to 1, to skip randomization, and get to where we call an EnterTrigger event on the encounter list activator. Return; Else ; Else, if NCR rep is at danger level, but Legion is cozy, then we spawn only NCR folks. Set iSquadRand to (1 + (GetRandomPercent * (2) / 100)); ; We randomize between encounters 1, and 2, which are the NCR hit squad encounters. Set iSquadOne to iSquadRand; Set iCount to 1; Return; Endif Elseif (iCount == 1) rSquadBox.EnterTrigger Player; ; rSquadBox is the ref of the Encounter List Activator (VFactionSquadListCodeHolder, EditorID). A TriggerEnter call forces its code to run. Set iCount to 2; ; This activator's script will select actors according to the value of iSquadOne, and then associate them to the active spawner-box. Return; ; iCount gets incremented, so that the code does not repeat any EnterTrigger calls while it waits for the encounter activator to do its thing. Endif Else ; Else, if bSquadChosen is not 0, that means that it's 1. This gets set by the encounter activator, once it's done selecting actors. If (iCount == 2) ; After the encounter is selected, and actors associated to the active spawner-box, here we make it spawn its stuff by calling EnterTrigger on it. rBoxSpawn.EnterTrigger Player; ; rBoxSpawn is the ref of the newest active spawner-box (in this case, the only one, unlike in NVDLC02, and NVDLC03). Set iCount to 3; ; Again, we increment iCount to prevent repeat calls. This var gets set back to 0 once the active spawner-box is done spawning the hit squad. Endif Endif Endif Endif
End ; Done, dude! ;<<<<<<<<<-----------------------------------------

scn AlTStartUDF
ref rRef int iStart begin function {}
if ALTGO == 0 ALTQ.iUpdate = 3
disableplayercontrols player.setscale 1 player.moveto ALTCellMarker
;from doc mitchell trigger GSVictorREF.MoveTo GSVictorCircuitStartMarkerREF; Set VFreeformGoodsprings.bVictorPatrol to 1; GSVictorREF.EVP RadioBlackMountainTAREF.enable RNVTARef.Enable ;enable Radio New Vegas
;disable goons and benny TopsBodyguardGoon1REF.disable BennyREF.disable BennySuiteDoorREF.SetDestroyed 1
;disable lucky38 victor Lucky38VictorEntranceREF.moveto ALTHoldingMarker Lucky38VictorEntranceREF.SetActorsAI 0
;remove beagle journal PrimmDeputyRef.removeitem VMQ01BeagleJournalNote 1
;boulder city disable rRef = StringtoRef "FalloutNV.esm:14F532" if isformvalid rRef rRef.SetDestroyed 1 endif LieutenantMonroeRef.moveto ALTHoldingMarker LieutenantMonroeRef.SetActorsAI 0
SetEssential DocMitchell 1 SetEssential Victor 1
if ismodloaded "Lone Star.esm" == 0 && ismodloaded "Leveled DLC Delay.esm" == 0 stopquest VPreorderCaravan stopquest VPreorderClassic stopquest VPreorderMercenary stopquest VPreorderTribal else startquest ALTPreorderQ endif
SetCellOwnership GSDocMitchellHouse DocMitchell
MannyVargasREF.removeitem VMQ01NoteObject 1
elseif ALTGO == 1 disableplayercontrols TopsBodyguardGoon1REF.enable BennyREF.enable BennySuiteDoorREF.SetDestroyed 0
PrimmDeputyRef.additem VMQ01BeagleJournalNote 1
rRef = StringtoRef "FalloutNV.esm:14F532" rRef.SetDestroyed 0 LieutenantMonroeRef.movetoeditorposition LieutenantMonroeRef.SetActorsAI 1 LieutenantMonroeRef.evp
SetEnemy playerfaction GoodspringsFaction 1 1 SetEnemy playerfaction GoodspringsMilitiaFaction 1 1 ClearFactionPlayerEnemyFlag GoodspringsFaction ClearFactionPlayerEnemyFlag GoodspringsMilitiaFaction DocMitchellRef.stopcombat SetCellOwnership GSDocMitchellHouse
SetEssential DocMitchell 0 SetEssential Victor 0
if Player.IsHardcore ToggleHardcoreTracking 0 endif setgamehour 336 if Player.IsHardcore ToggleHardcoreTracking 1 endif
Player.ResetHealth; Player.RestoreActorValue PerceptionCondition 100; Player.RestoreActorValue EnduranceCondition 100; Player.RestoreActorValue LeftAttackCondition 100; Player.RestoreActorValue RightAttackCondition 100; Player.RestoreActorValue LeftMobilityCondition 100; Player.RestoreActorValue RightMobilityCondition 100; Player.RestoreActorValue RadiationRads 1000; Player.cios NVDLC04RestUp
if eval (GetINIFloat "All:bBennyTakesYourStuff" "ALTStartConfig.ini") == 1 ALTStuffBagNewRef.enable endif
if eval (GetINIFloat "All:bCompanionsDismiss" "ALTStartConfig.ini") == 1 startquest P04CompanionFireQuest call ALTDogmeatDismiss ALTQ 1 endif
player.removeallitems ALTStuffRef 1 1
Lucky38VictorEntranceREF.movetoeditorposition Lucky38VictorEntranceREF.SetActorsAI 1 Lucky38VictorEntranceREF.evp
player.moveto ALTHoldingMarker
ALTMojaveExpressBoardRef.SetDestroyed 1 ALTMojaveExpressBoardMORef.SetDestroyed 1 ALTMojaveExpressBoardCCRef.SetDestroyed 1 ALTMojaveExpressBoardWSRef.SetDestroyed 1
SetLastExtDoorActivated GSDocMitchellHouseIntDoorREF
MannyVargasREF.Additem VMQ01NoteObject 1
callafterseconds 1 (begin function {} StartQuest VCG00 SetStage VCG00 0 end)
endif
end

scn ALTDogmeatDismiss
ref rQuest int iStageIdx
begin Function {rQuest, iStageIdx}
if ALTDogmeatRef.Fired == 0 && ALTDogmeatRef.GetDisabled == 0
set ALTDogMeatRef.Waiting to 0 set ALTDogMeatRef.Fired to 1
ALTDogMeatRef.SetPlayerTeammate 0
player.removeperk ALTDogmeatPerk ALTDogMeatRef.RemoveFromFaction FollowerFaction
ShowMessage ALTDogmeatHomeMessage ALTDogMeatRef.ResetAI
ALTDogMeatRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade ALTDogMeatHome endif
end

Scn ALTStartQscript
Float iStage Int iBackground Ref rMarker Ref rRef Int iWealth String_Var svString
Int bBlockUI Int iUI Ref rBackMSG String_Var sBackDesc String_Var sUIName String_Var sUIPath
Int bCustomMenu Float ftimer
Int ModOverridingIndex String_Var modName

; ===== remove comments from Preorder gear ====

Return ElseIf Eval IsFormOverridden VCG00 Set ModOverridingIndex to GetFormOverrideIndex VCG00 Let modName := GetModName ModOverridingIndex 1 messageboxex "The starting quest %qVCG00%q which Alternate Start needs to function is being overwritten by %z. Scn ALTStartQscript
Float iStage Int iBackground Ref rMarker Ref rRef Int iWealth String_Var svString
Int bBlockUI Int iUI Ref rBackMSG String_Var sBackDesc String_Var sUIName String_Var sUIPath
Int bCustomMenu Float ftimer
Int ModOverridingIndex String_Var modName
Ref rLambda Int iAmount
; ===== remove comments from Preorder gear ====
Begin menumode 1001 If bCustomMenu == 1 If iStage == -1 SetUIFloatAlt "MessageMenu/NOGLOW_BRANCH/MM_MainRect/width" 1000 SetUIFloatAlt "MessageMenu/NOGLOW_BRANCH/MM_MainRect/MM_MessageText/wrapwidth" 940 SetUIFloatAlt "MessageMenu/NOGLOW_BRANCH/MM_MainRect/MM_BottomBracket/y" 768 SetUIFloatALT "MessageMenu/NOGLOW_BRANCH/MM_MainRect/MM_ButtonList/x" 600 SetUIFloatALT "MessageMenu/NOGLOW_BRANCH/MM_MainRect/MM_ButtonList/y" 320 If Eval GetUIString "MessageMenu/NOGLOW_BRANCH/MM_MainRect/MM_Title/string" == "Background" If GetActiveUIComponentID == 7 If sUIName != GetActiveUIComponentName sUIName = GetActiveUIComponentName sUIPath = "MessageMenu/NOGLOW_BRANCH/MM_MainRect/MM_ButtonList/"+$sUIName+"/listindex" iUI = GetUIFloatAlt $sUIPath rBackMSG = ListGetNthForm ALTBackList iUI sBackDesc = GetFormDescription rBackMSG SetUIStringAlt "MessageMenu/NOGLOW_BRANCH/MM_MainRect/MM_MessageText/string" $sBackDesc SetUIFloatAlt "MessageMenu/NOGLOW_BRANCH/MM_MainRect/MM_MessageText/justify" 1 EndIf EndIf EndIf EndIf EndIf
End
Begin gamemode If getgamerestarted If GetNVSEVersion < 6 messageboxex "Alternate Start requires NVSE version 6.3.0 or greater. Make sure you update it or this mod will not work." Return ElseIf IsPluginInstalled "JIP NVSE Plugin" == 0 messageboxex "Alternate Start requires JIP LN NVSE. Make sure you have it installed or this mod will not work." Return ElseIf IsPluginInstalled "JohnnyGuitarNVSE" == 0 messageboxex "Alternate Start requires JohnnyGuitarNVSE. Make sure you have it installed or this mod will not work." Return ElseIf IsPluginInstalled "ShowOffNVSE Plugin" == 0 messageboxex "Alternate Start requires ShowOffNVSE. Make sure you have it installed or this mod will not work." Return ElseIf ismodloaded "Better Character Creation.esm" messageboxex "Incompatible Mod Detected: Better Character Creation%r%r Better Character Creation is not compatible with Alternate Start. If you proceed, you will experience issues." Return ElseIf Eval IsFormOverridden VCG00 Set ModOverridingIndex to GetFormOverrideIndex VCG00 Let modName := GetModName ModOverridingIndex 1 messageboxex "The starting quest %qVCG00%q which Alternate Start needs to function is being overwritten by %z. Resolve this conflict or the mod will not work properly." modName sv_destruct modName Return ElseIf Eval IsFormOverridden VCG01 Set ModOverridingIndex to GetFormOverrideIndex VCG01 Let modName := GetModName ModOverridingIndex 1 messageboxex "The starting quest %qVCG01%q which Alternate Start needs to function is being overwritten by %z. Resolve this conflict or the mod will not work properly." modName sv_destruct modName Return Elseif ismodloaded "YUP - Base Game + All DLC.esm" && GetModIndex "YUP - Base Game + All DLC.esm" > GetModIndex "AltStart.esm" messageboxex "WARNING: YUP - Base Game + All DLC.esm is loaded below AltStart.esm.%r%rMake sure YUP is loaded above AltStart.esm in your load order or you will experience issues." return endif EndIf
If bCustomMenu == 0 If Eval (GetINIFloat "All:bDisableBackgroundMenu" "ALTStartConfig.ini") == 1 bCustomMenu = -1 Else bCustomMenu = 1 EndIf EndIf
If iStage == 0 iUI = -1 call ALTBackgroundMenu -1 iStage = -1 ElseIf iStage == 1 GetPlayerName iStage = 2 ElseIf iStage == 2 ShowRaceMenu iStage = 3 ElseIf iStage == 3 If ALTBackground == 41 Player.SetActorValue intelligence 3 Player.SetActorValue charisma 3 SetSPECIALPoints 36 Else SetSPECIALPoints 40 EndIf iStage = 4 ElseIf iStage == 4 SetTagSkills 3 1 iSTage = 5 ElseIf iStage == 5 SetPerkFlag WildWasteland 1 0 ShowTraitMenu iStage = 6 ElseIf iStage == 6 messageboxexalt ALTWildWastelandMSG "^狂野废土^狂野废土将向你展示后启示录美国最荒唐古怪的一面。一板一眼可不是这个游戏的风格！%r%r你是否想体验不一样的经历？一经选择，便不能再改变。|买票，上车......|我不相信外星人！" ElseIf iStage == 7 ALTCasualtHardcoreMessageActivateRef.activate Player 1 iStage = 8

ESP.ORIGINAL: %r[b]

scn ALTPrintBackgrounds
array_var aList int i string_var svString ref rRef
begin function {} writestringtofile "altbackgrounds.txt" 1 "==Backgrounds==" aList = GetListForms ALTBackList i = -1 while (i+=1) < (ar_size aList) rRef = aList[i] svString = LNGetName rRef svString = "%r[b]" + $svString + "[/b]" writestringtofile "altbackgrounds.txt" 1 $svString svString = GetFormDescription rRef writestringtofile "altbackgrounds.txt" 1 $svString loop
end
$sMSG

scn ALTGamblerPreActEvent
ref rRef string_var sMSG
begin function {rRef}
if ALTBackground == 3 sMSG = $GetStringSetting "sGamblingBannedText" messageex $sMSG setfunctionvalue 0 endif
end

ESP.ORIGINAL: $sVeronicLoc
$sMajorKnight
How did the Three Families defeat us?
ESP.TRADUIT: 三大家族是怎么击败我们的？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: LNSetName "How did the Three Families defeat us?" VMS45VRRCPapaKhanTopic016

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me about our tribe?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: LNSetName "Can you tell me about our tribe?" PapaKhanKhans

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just trying to do my part for the tribe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只是在尽力帮助我们的部族。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: LNSetName "Just trying to do my part for the tribe." vFreeformSloanQJMelissaTopic017

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have a look at this book. Our tribe is nothing but a bunch of thugs, aping the glories of the past.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看这本书吧。我们的部族只不过是一帮混混，流连于过去的荣耀。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: LNSetName "Have a look at this book. Our tribe is nothing but a bunch of thugs, aping the glories of the past." VMS45VRRCPapaKhanTopic013

ESP.ORIGINAL: Have a look at this book. If you want to see what our tribe could be, read about the Mongol Empire.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看这本书吧。如果你想知道我们能成就些什么，了解一下蒙古帝国。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: LNSetName "Have a look at this book. If you want to see what our tribe could be, read about the Mongol Empire." VMS45VRRCPapaKhanTopic011

ESP.ORIGINAL: We don't need to look outward, mighty Khan. Our tribe is proud and strong - we should claim our own glory!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不需要依靠外人，我们的部族骄傲而强大，可以自己争取荣耀！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: LNSetName "We don't need to look outward, mighty Khan. Our tribe is proud and strong - we should claim our own glory!" VMS45VRRCPapaKhanTopic003

ESP.ORIGINAL: What great legacy do the Great Khans have? Our tribe is nothing but ghosts and martyrs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大汗帮还有什么遗产？我们的部族已经是过去的幽灵。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: LNSetName "What great legacy do the Great Khans have? Our tribe is nothing but ghosts and martyrs." VMS45VRRCPapaKhanTopic009

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you tell me more about Novac?
ESP.TRADUIT: 给我讲讲更多诺瓦克的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: LNSetName "Can you tell me more about Novac?" JeannieCrawfordWhereAmI

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just moved into town. Pleasure to meet you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刚搬到镇上，很高兴见到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: LNSetName "I just moved into town. Pleasure to meet you." MannyVargasWhoAreYou

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just moved into town, and I wanted to introduce myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刚搬到镇上，想自我介绍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: LNSetName "I just moved into town, and I wanted to introduce myself." AliceMcBrideIntro

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is this any way to treat your new neighbor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是对待邻居的态度吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: LNSetName "Is this any way to treat your new neighbor?" CraigBooneDoesntAffectMe

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just moved into town, and I wanted to introduce myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刚搬到镇上，想自我介绍。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: LNSetName "I just moved into town, and I wanted to introduce myself." AliceMcBrideIntro

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yep, I just moved into the neighborhood.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: LNSetName "Yep, I just moved into the neighborhood." CraigBooneYes

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why can't every man in Freeside join the Kings?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不能让自由城的每个人都加入猫王帮？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: LNSetName "Why can't every man in Freeside join the Kings?" VFreeformFreesideVFSTheKingTopic065

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm happy to help.
How long have you worked for the Gun Runners?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在军火贩子工作多久了？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: LNSetName "How long have you worked for the Gun Runners?" vDialogueGunRunnerNVIsaacTopic000

ESP.ORIGINAL:
scn ALTEDEHireUDF
begin function {} ; -------------------------------------------------------------------------\/ (8_14_10) Added to fix missing commands. -ETB
If ( EDE1REF.Waiting == 1 && EDE1REF.GetDisabled == 0 ) Set EDE1REF.Waiting to 0 Endif If ( EDE2REF.Waiting == 1 && EDE2REF.GetDisabled == 0 ) Set EDE2REF.Waiting to 0 Endif If ( EDE3REF.Waiting == 1 && EDE3REF.GetDisabled == 0 ) Set EDE3REF.Waiting to 0 Endif
IgnoreCrime 1
; -------------------------------------------------------------------------/\
set VNPCFollowers.bPlayerHasFollower to 1 set VNPCFollowers.bEDEHired to 1 set VNPCFollowers.bEDEFired to 0 set VNPCFollowers.bCritterInParty to 1 addperk CompanionSuite player.addperk EnhancedSensors set EDE1REF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 set EDE2REF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 set EDE3REF.CombatStyleRanged to 1 set EDE1REF.CombatStyleMelee to 0 set EDE2REF.CombatStyleMelee to 0 set EDE3REF.CombatStyleMelee to 0 showmessage FollowerMessagePerkEDEAdd set VNPCFollowers.nCurrentFollowers to (VNPCFollowers.nCurrentFollowers + 1) setCS FollowersCombatStyleRanged AddToFaction FollowerFaction 1 SetPlayerTeammate 1 SetFactionRank TeammateFaction 1 evp SIFH 1
end

scn ALTCapsStashScript
begin onadd player player.additem ALTCapsLL 4 removeme ALTCapsStashRef.disable end
%g caps donated to the church.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: messageex "%g caps donated to the church." iAmount

ESP.ORIGINAL:
scn ALTCapEvent
ref rBaseItem ref rNewOwner int iAmount ref rItem
;SetEventHandlerAlt "ShowOff:OnAdd" ALTCapEvent 1::Caps001 2::player
begin Function { ref rBaseItem, ref rNewOwner }
if rNewOwner == player && rBaseItem == caps001 if MenuMode 1053 rItem = GetAddedItemRefShowOff iAmount = rItem.GetRefCount iAmount *= 0.25 iAmount = Floor iAmount player.removeitem caps001 iAmount 1 refreshitemslist messageex "%g caps donated to the church." iAmount ENDIF endif
end
ESP.TRADUIT:
scn ALTCapEvent
ref rBaseItem ref rNewOwner int iAmount ref rItem
;SetEventHandlerAlt "ShowOff:OnAdd" ALTCapEvent 1::Caps001 2::player
begin Function { ref rBaseItem, ref rNewOwner }
if rNewOwner == player && rBaseItem == caps001 if MenuMode 1053 rItem = GetAddedItemRefShowOff iAmount = rItem.GetRefCount iAmount *= 0.25 iAmount = Floor iAmount player.removeitem caps001 iAmount 1 refreshitemslist messageex "%g 瓶盖已捐献给教会" iAmount ENDIF endif
end

ESP.ORIGINAL: You can't look at this while you are in combat!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你不能在战斗中看这个！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: messageex "You can't look at this while you are in combat!"

ESP.ORIGINAL: ojave Express^The Mojave Express is hiring!%r%rInterested in a fulfilling career that offers good pay and a chance to experience the great outdoors? Why not become a courier with the Mojave Express!%r%rThe Mojave Express is looking for hardworking individuals who are familiar with the Vegas area. If interested in the job, please visit our main office in the Hub.|Become a courier.|Exit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 斓較莫哈维快递招聘中！%r%r你是否想要一份高薪和冒险的机会？成为莫哈维快递的邮差吧！%r%r莫哈维快递正在招聘熟悉维加斯的人。有意者请前往哈伯城总部。|成为邮差。|离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: messageboxexalt rLambda "^The Mojave Express^The Mojave Express is hiring!%r%rInterested in a fulfilling career that offers good pay and a chance to experience the great outdoors? Why not become a courier with the Mojave Express!%r%rThe Mojave Express is looking for hardworking individuals who are familiar with the Vegas area. If interested in the job, please visit our main office in the Hub.|Become a courier.|Exit."

ESP.ORIGINAL:
scn ALTMojaveExpressBoardScript
ref rLambda int iButton
begin onactivate if ALTGO == 0 if isactionref player if player.isincombat messageex "You can't look at this while you are in combat!" else rLambda = (begin function {iButton} if iButton == 0 disableplayercontrols imod FadeToBlack4sISFX set ALTGO to 1 DocMitchellRef.evp DocMitchellRef.moveto ALTDocMitchellChairRef callafterseconds 3 ({}=>call ALTStartUDF) endif end) messageboxexalt rLambda "^The Mojave Express^The Mojave Express is hiring!%r%rInterested in a fulfilling career that offers good pay and a chance to experience the great outdoors? Why not become a courier with the Mojave Express!%r%rThe Mojave Express is looking for hardworking individuals who are familiar with the Vegas area. If interested in the job, please visit our main office in the Hub.|Become a courier.|Exit." endif endif endif end
ESP.TRADUIT:
scn ALTMojaveExpressBoardScript
ref rLambda int iButton
begin onactivate if ALTGO == 0 if isactionref player if player.isincombat messageex "你不能在战斗中看这个！" else rLambda = (begin function {iButton} if iButton == 0 disableplayercontrols imod FadeToBlack4sISFX set ALTGO to 1 DocMitchellRef.evp DocMitchellRef.moveto ALTDocMitchellChairRef callafterseconds 3 ({}=>call ALTStartUDF) endif end) messageboxexalt rLambda "^莫哈维快递^莫哈维快递招聘中！%r%r你是否想要一份高薪和冒险的机会？成为莫哈维快递的邮差吧！%r%r莫哈维快递正在招聘熟悉维加斯的人。有意者请前往哈伯城总部。|成为邮差。|离开。" endif endif endif end

ESP.ORIGINAL: You got your stuff that Benny stole back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你拿回了本尼夺走的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: messageex "You got your stuff that Benny stole back."

ESP.ORIGINAL:
scn ALTStuffBagScript
begin onactivate if isactionref player ALTStuffRef.removeallitems player 1 1 disable 1 messageex "You got your stuff that Benny stole back." playsound UIItemTakeAll markfordelete endif
if 0 showmessage ALTJam endif end
ESP.TRADUIT:
scn ALTStuffBagScript
begin onactivate if isactionref player ALTStuffRef.removeallitems player 1 1 disable 1 messageex "你拿回了本尼夺走的东西。" playsound UIItemTakeAll markfordelete endif
if 0 showmessage ALTJam endif end

ESP.ORIGINAL:
scn ALTLoneWolfUDF
begin function {} if GetPipBoyRadio != 0 setfunctionvalue 1 endif end
Nothing quite jazzes you up like the thrill of turning a radio dial!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有什么比转动无线电旋钮更让你兴奋了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: messageex "Nothing quite jazzes you up like the thrill of turning a radio dial!"

ESP.ORIGINAL:
scn ALTLonewolfActivateEvent
ref rActivator ref rActivated short bIsActivationNotPrevented
begin Function { rActivator, bIsActivationNotPrevented } rActivated = GetSelfAlt if rActivated.GetDestroyed == 0 if player.isspelltargetalt ALTLoneWolfRadio == 0 player.cios ALTLoneWolfRadio messageex "Nothing quite jazzes you up like the thrill of turning a radio dial!" endif player.cios ALTLoneWolfRadioUMON endif
end
ESP.TRADUIT:
scn ALTLonewolfActivateEvent
ref rActivator ref rActivated short bIsActivationNotPrevented
begin Function { rActivator, bIsActivationNotPrevented } rActivated = GetSelfAlt if rActivated.GetDestroyed == 0 if player.isspelltargetalt ALTLoneWolfRadio == 0 player.cios ALTLoneWolfRadio messageex "没有什么比转动无线电旋钮更让你兴奋了！" endif player.cios ALTLoneWolfRadioUMON endif
end

ESP.ORIGINAL:
scn ALTYumaFlatsUDF
ref rWeap
begin function{}
rWeap = player.GetEquippedWeaponRef if rWeap.GetWeaponSkill == 34 SetFunctionValue 1 else SetFunctionValue 0 endif
end

scn ALTGunRunnerCodeBoxScript
begin gamemode if ALTBackground == 49 && GetPCEnemyOfFaction GunRunnerFactionNV == 0 if vDialogueGunRunner.bPlayerIntruder == 1 set vDialogueGunRunner.bPlayerIntruder to 0 endif else disable markfordelete endif end

scn ALTGunRunnerUDF
begin function {} disableplayercontrols imod FadeToBlack4sISFX callwhen (begin function {} rewardxp 10 player.additem caps001 80 messageex "You feel tired after your shift." player.cios ALTGunRunnerShift setgamehour (GameHour + 8) enableplayercontrols end)({}=> IsImageSpaceActive FadeToBlack4sISFX == 0)
end

scn ALTGunRunnerUDF
ref rWeap
begin function{}
rWeap = player.GetEquippedWeaponRef if rWeap.GetWeaponSkill == 41 SetFunctionValue 1 else SetFunctionValue 0 endif
end
#0|You don't have any fingers to turn in.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: messageexalt 3 "#0|You don't have any fingers to turn in."

ESP.ORIGINAL: #2|Your karma is too low to turn in fingers.
ESP.TRADUIT: #2|你的道德值太低了，不能交付手指。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: messageexalt 3 "#2|Your karma is too low to turn in fingers."

ESP.ORIGINAL:
scn ALTRegulatorRepScript
begin onactivate if GetDead activate elseif isactionref player != 1 activate else if player.GetIsAlignment Good || player.GetIsAlignment VeryGood if player.getitemcount ALTFinger > 0 if player.GetIsAlignment VeryGood eval player.additem caps001 ((player.getitemcount ALTFinger)*20) else eval player.additem caps001 ((player.getitemcount ALTFinger)*10) endif eval player.removeitem ALTFinger (player.getitemcount ALTFinger) sayto player ALTRegulatorConvo else messageexalt 3 "#0|You don't have any fingers to turn in." endif else messageexalt 3 "#2|Your karma is too low to turn in fingers." endif endif end
ESP.TRADUIT:
scn ALTRegulatorRepScript
begin onactivate if GetDead activate elseif isactionref player != 1 activate else if player.GetIsAlignment Good || player.GetIsAlignment VeryGood if player.getitemcount ALTFinger > 0 if player.GetIsAlignment VeryGood eval player.additem caps001 ((player.getitemcount ALTFinger)*20) else eval player.additem caps001 ((player.getitemcount ALTFinger)*10) endif eval player.removeitem ALTFinger (player.getitemcount ALTFinger) sayto player ALTRegulatorConvo else messageexalt 3 "#0|你没有手指可供交付。" endif else messageexalt 3 "#2|你的道德值太低了，不能交付手指。" endif endif end

ESP.ORIGINAL: #2|Your karma is too high to turn in ears.

ESP.ORIGINAL:
scn ALTContractKillerRepScript
begin onactivate if GetDead activate elseif isactionref player != 1 activate else if player.GetIsAlignment Evil || player.GetIsAlignment VeryEvil if player.getitemcount ALTEar > 0 if player.GetIsAlignment VeryEvil eval player.additem caps001 ((player.getitemcount ALTEar)*100) else eval player.additem caps001 ((player.getitemcount ALTEar)*50) endif eval player.removeitem ALTEar (player.getitemcount ALTEar) sayto player ALTRegulatorConvo else messageexalt 3 "#0|You don't have any ears to turn in." endif else messageexalt 3 "#2|Your karma is too high to turn in ears." endif endif end
ESP.TRADUIT:
scn ALTContractKillerRepScript
begin onactivate if GetDead activate elseif isactionref player != 1 activate else if player.GetIsAlignment Evil || player.GetIsAlignment VeryEvil if player.getitemcount ALTEar > 0 if player.GetIsAlignment VeryEvil eval player.additem caps001 ((player.getitemcount ALTEar)*100) else eval player.additem caps001 ((player.getitemcount ALTEar)*50) endif eval player.removeitem ALTEar (player.getitemcount ALTEar) sayto player ALTRegulatorConvo else messageexalt 3 "#0|你没有耳朵可交付。" endif else messageexalt 3 "#2|你的道德值太高了，不能交付耳朵。" endif endif end

ESP.ORIGINAL:
scn ALTDogMeatKnockdownScript
ref Myself ref MyTarget
begin ScriptEffectStart set MyTarget to GetCombatTarget if VNPCFollowers.nCurrentFollowers == 0 MyTarget.DamageActorValue Health 15 endif if GetRandomPercent < 20 If MyTarget.HasPerk Stonewall ;ShowMessage StonewallMessage Else ALTDogMeatRef.pushactoraway MyTarget 3 EndIf endif end
Dogmeat has died!

scn ALTDogMeatScript
; Follower Variables short CombatStyleRanged short CombatStyleMelee short DoOnce short FollowerSwitchAggressive short IsFollowingDefault short IsFollowingShort short IsFollowingLong short Waiting
short Fired short L38
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
begin OnCombatEnd
if GetPlayerTeammate == 1 resethealth restoreav perceptioncondition 100 restoreav endurancecondition 100 restoreav leftattackcondition 100 restoreav leftmobilitycondition 100 restoreav rightattackcondition 100 restoreav rightmobilitycondition 100 endif
end
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
begin OnDeath
messageboxex "Dogmeat has died!"
end
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

short Fired short L38
;---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
begin OnCombatEnd

end

ESP.ORIGINAL:
scn ALTRichKidHit
ref rTarget ref rAttacker float iCaps
begin Function {rTarget, rAttacker}
iCaps = player.getitemcount caps001 iCaps *= 0.001 iCaps = Floor iCaps ;print $iCaps ;print $rTarget.getav health if rTarget.GetDead ;print "dead" return elseif iCaps > rTarget.getav health rTarget.kill rAttacker ;print "kill" else rTarget.damageav health iCaps ;print "damage" endif ;print "test"
end
^Nightstalker Items^
|Exit

scn ALTViperTurnIn
int iButton int iIndex string_var sMenu
begin function {iButton}
sMenu = "^Nightstalker Items^" iIndex = -1
if player.getitemcount NightstalkerEgg > 0 iIndex += 1 sMenu += "|" + $NightstalkerEgg if iButton == iIndex ALTQ.rTurnInItem = NightstalkerEgg ALTQ.iTurnInValue = 50 showquantitymenu ALTQuantityMenu (player.getitemcount NightstalkerEgg) 1 return endif endif
if player.getitemcount NightStalkerBlood > 0 iIndex += 1 sMenu += "|" + $NightStalkerBlood if iButton == iIndex ALTQ.rTurnInItem = NightStalkerBlood ALTQ.iTurnInValue = 10 showquantitymenu ALTQuantityMenu (player.getitemcount NightStalkerBlood) 1 return endif endif
if player.getitemcount NightstalkerTail > 0 iIndex += 1 sMenu += "|" + $NightstalkerTail if iButton == iIndex ALTQ.rTurnInItem = NightstalkerTail ALTQ.iTurnInValue = 25 showquantitymenu ALTQuantityMenu (player.getitemcount NightstalkerTail) 1 return endif endif
iIndex += 1 sMenu += "|Exit" if iButton == iIndex return endif
messageboxexalt ALTViperTurnIn $sMenu
end
ESP.TRADUIT:
scn ALTViperTurnIn
int iButton int iIndex string_var sMenu
begin function {iButton}
sMenu = "^夜枭物品^" iIndex = -1
if player.getitemcount NightstalkerEgg > 0 iIndex += 1 sMenu += "|" + $NightstalkerEgg if iButton == iIndex ALTQ.rTurnInItem = NightstalkerEgg ALTQ.iTurnInValue = 50 showquantitymenu ALTQuantityMenu (player.getitemcount NightstalkerEgg) 1 return endif endif
if player.getitemcount NightStalkerBlood > 0 iIndex += 1 sMenu += "|" + $NightStalkerBlood if iButton == iIndex ALTQ.rTurnInItem = NightStalkerBlood ALTQ.iTurnInValue = 10 showquantitymenu ALTQuantityMenu (player.getitemcount NightStalkerBlood) 1 return endif endif
if player.getitemcount NightstalkerTail > 0 iIndex += 1 sMenu += "|" + $NightstalkerTail if iButton == iIndex ALTQ.rTurnInItem = NightstalkerTail ALTQ.iTurnInValue = 25 showquantitymenu ALTQuantityMenu (player.getitemcount NightstalkerTail) 1 return endif endif
iIndex += 1 sMenu += "|离开" if iButton == iIndex return endif
messageboxexalt ALTViperTurnIn $sMenu
end

scn ALTAtomBaseEffectScript

scn ALTAtomBaseEffectScript
begin ScriptEffectStart if player.getav radiationrads < 50 MessageExAlt 3 "#0|缺乏辐射使你变弱。" ALTQ.iState = 1 else MessageExAlt 3 "#1|辐射使你更强大。" ALTQ.iState = 0 endif end

ESP.ORIGINAL:
scn ALTSetFlagUDF
ref rBase int iType int iFlag int bSet int iMask int iBit
;call ALTSetFlagUDF VCrTier1CoyoteMed 1 5 1
begin function {rBase iType iBit bSet}
if iType iFlag = GetActorBaseFlagsHigh rBase else iFlag = GetActorBaseFlagsLow rBase endif
iFlag = SetBit iFlag iBit bSet
if iType SetActorBaseFlagsHigh iFlag rBase else SetActorBaseFlagsLow iFlag rBase endif
end

scn ALTQuantityMenu
int iQuantity
begin function {iQuantity} if iQuantity > 0 eval player.removeitem (ALTQ.rTurnInItem) iQuantity eval player.additem caps001 (iQuantity * (ALTQ.iTurnInValue)) endif end

scn ALTPreorderQscript
ref rRef
begin gamemode
if VDLCPackQuest.bMercenaryItemsGiven && VDLCPackQuest.bClassicItemsGiven && VDLCPackQuest.bCaravanItemsGiven && VDLCPackQuest.bTribalItemsGiven print "go" if ALTBackground > 0 if ALTBackground == 17 ;classic if ismodloaded "Lone Star.esm" rRef = StringtoRef "Lone Star.esm:01FFB5" ;Vault Armor if IsFormValid rRef rRef.disable endif
rRef = StringtoRef "Lone Star.esm:01FFB6" ;10mm pistol if IsFormValid rRef rRef.disable endif
rRef = StringtoRef "Lone Star.esm:01FFB7" ;canteen if IsFormValid rRef rRef.disable endif endif if ismodloaded "Leveled DLC Delay.esm" rRef = StringtoRef "Leveled DLC Delay.esm:5B9B" ;Vault Armor if IsFormValid rRef rRef.disable endif
rRef = StringtoRef "Leveled DLC Delay.esm:5B9C" ;10mm pistol if IsFormValid rRef rRef.disable endif
rRef = StringtoRef "Leveled DLC Delay.esm:5B9D" ;canteen if IsFormValid rRef rRef.disable endif endif elseif ALTBackground == 18 ;tribal if ismodloaded "Lone Star.esm" rRef = StringtoRef "Lone Star.esm:1FFAE" ;Tribal Armor if IsFormValid rRef rRef.disable endif
rRef = StringtoRef "Lone Star.esm:1FFAF" ;machete if IsFormValid rRef rRef.disable endif endif if ismodloaded "Leveled DLC Delay.esm" rRef = StringtoRef "Leveled DLC Delay.esm:5B94" ;Tribal Armor if IsFormValid rRef rRef.disable endif
rRef = StringtoRef "Leveled DLC Delay.esm:5B95" ;machete if IsFormValid rRef rRef.disable endif endif elseif ALTBackground == 19 ;caravan if ismodloaded "Lone Star.esm" rRef = StringtoRef "Lone Star.esm:1FFB0" ;shotgun if IsFormValid rRef rRef.disable endif
rRef = StringtoRef "Lone Star.esm:1FFB1" ;leather armor if IsFormValid rRef rRef.disable endif endif if ismodloaded "Leveled DLC Delay.esm" rRef = StringtoRef "Leveled DLC Delay.esm:5B96" ;shotgun if IsFormValid rRef rRef.disable endif
rRef = StringtoRef "Leveled DLC Delay.esm:5B97" ;leather armor if IsFormValid rRef rRef.disable endif endif elseif ALTBackground == 20 ;merc if ismodloaded "Lone Star.esm" rRef = StringtoRef "Lone Star.esm:1FFB2" ;metal armor if IsFormValid rRef rRef.disable endif
rRef = StringtoRef "Lone Star.esm:1FFB3" ;grenade rifle if IsFormValid rRef rRef.disable endif endif if ismodloaded "Leveled DLC Delay.esm" rRef = StringtoRef "Leveled DLC Delay.esm:5B98" ;metal armor if IsFormValid rRef rRef.disable endif
rRef = StringtoRef "Leveled DLC Delay.esm:5B99" ;grenade rifle if IsFormValid rRef rRef.disable endif endif endif endif stopquest ALTPreorderQ endif
end
