GREETING
Hey there. Are you looking for a job?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojave Express Represenative [0A0016EE] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\altmojaverepvoice\altq_greeting_000016e7_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If so, the Mojave Express is always hiring couriers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 要找工作的话，莫哈维快递一直在招募新的邮差。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojave Express Represenative [0A0016EE] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\altmojaverepvoice\altq_greeting_000016e7_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah? What is it?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Motor-Runner [000EF3AB] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult03\altq_greeting_00007100_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: <bark!>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_greeting_00007112_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's important that you're relaxed for this next test. Please, have a seat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你只有保持放松，我们才能开始下一项测试。来吧，请坐。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Mitchell [00104C0C] (file) Quest : ([00104C1C]VCG01) Ain't That a Kick in the Head EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: All right. I'm gonna say a word. I want you to say the first thing that comes to mind.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧。我先说一个单词。然后你告诉我你脑海中闪现的第一印象是什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Mitchell [00104C0C] (file) Quest : ([00104C1C]VCG01) Ain't That a Kick in the Head EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dog.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Mitchell [00104C0C] (file) Quest : ([00104C1C]VCG01) Ain't That a Kick in the Head EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set VCG01.bBeganTest to 1;
set VCG01.bGiveTest to 0;
Here. These are yours. Was all you had on you when you was brought in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你。这些都是你的。你被送进来的时候，身上就带着这些东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Mitchell [00104C0C] (file) Quest : ([00104C1C]VCG01) Ain't That a Kick in the Head EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you don't mind but I gave the note a look. I thought it might help me find a next of kin. But it was just something about a platinum chip.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看了一眼你的笔记，希望你别介意。我本来是想看看你有没有什么亲友，但上面只写了一则关于什么白金筹码的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Mitchell [00104C0C] (file) Quest : ([00104C1C]VCG01) Ain't That a Kick in the Head EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted VCG01 50 1 AddNote VMQ01CourierNote if ALTStuffBagNewRef.GetDisabled == 0 player.additemalt OutfitRepublican01 1 45 1 1 else ALTStuffRef.removeallitems player 1 1 endif
Well. Welcome to you. You look tired from the road. Why don't you relax a spell, let this fine town take care of you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎你。你看起来刚经历了一段疲惫的旅程。不如在这个宜人的小镇里呆上一阵，调养一下？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey there. In from out of town, ain't you? Name's Dusty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗨。从外面来的，是吧？我叫达斯蒂。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set VDialogueNovac.bMetDusty to 1;
It's about time a new customer showed up around here. Was getting sick of dealing with the same faces all the time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可算是有新主顾来了。总是和那些老面孔打交道，我都要吐了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Male Player in Powder Ganger gear}I know {emphasis "all"}all the guys I did time with around here and you ain't one of them. Can't fool me with that Powder Ganger getup.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Male Player in Powder Ganger gear}我认识{emphasis "all"}和我一起驻守在这里的每一个人。靠炸药帮的制服可骗不了我。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Female player in Powder Ganger gear}Okay, I know I wasn't serving time with no girl, or I'd have heard about it. You come to play with the Powder Gangers?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Female player in Powder Ganger gear}好吧，据我所知我们的人里没有姑娘，否则我一定会知道的。你是来给炸药帮找乐子的么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Male PC}Look at you, walking in here like you're one of us. Don't you know this is Powder Ganger territory?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Male PC}看看你，就这么大摇大摆地走进来，好像你跟我们一伙儿似的。你不知道这里是炸药帮的地盘吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: set VFreeformNCRCF.MetDawes to 1
{Female PC}Hey there, girlie. You here to party with the Powder Gangers?
ESP.TRADUIT: {Female PC}嘿，小妞。你是来找炸药帮寻开心的么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: set VFreeformNCRCF.MetDawes to 1
Heard there was a new face around. I'm the doctor around here... sort of.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我早听说这儿来了个新面孔。我算是这里的医生……之类的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't know anyone would willingly walk into this place, not unless they were looking for trouble. What's your story?
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果不是找麻烦，一般人是不会来这里的。所以，你想干什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dawes said he let somebody in. So, you going to give me a reason not to kill you and throw your body back outside?
ESP.TRADUIT: 道斯说他放了个人进来。你最好能给我个理由，不然我就宰了你，再把尸体扔出去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set VFreeformNCRCF.MetEddie to 1
I don't handle buying and selling for the Gun Runners. Talk to the robot in the kiosk near our factory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不负责枪支走私者的买卖业务。去找我们工厂旁边那个亭子里的机器人吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You must be the one Doc Mitchell was patching up. The way I heard it, I didn't think you'd be walking out of that office.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你就是米切尔医生救活的那个人吧。我听说了你的事，还以为你根本走不出那间办公室呢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got plenty of supplies for sale. Even got some weapon mods and special ammo - well worth the caps, if you ask me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我这儿货源充足，甚至还进了一些武器模块和特殊弹药——要我说的话，绝对物超所值。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you're hurting for caps, I've also got boxes of surplus ammo in the miscellaneous section. They're not great, but you get what you pay for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你手头紧的话，我这里倒是还有几盒军需备用弹。虽然品质不怎么样，但一分钱一分货嘛。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome back. I had hoped you wouldn't need to come see me again so soon. What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎回来。我还以为你不会这么快就回来找我。需要我做点什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Look, Rexie, someone new's come to see us. {Sighs}Poor boy. He hasn't been feeling well lately. I'm the King. What can I do for you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 瞧啊，雷克斯，咱们有客人了。{Sighs}可怜的孩子，他最近一直不舒服。我就是猫王。你有何贵干？

ESP.ORIGINAL: You look new to Freeside, so here's a little advice, friend. Don't go past the south gate greeter without talking to it first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是第一次来自由城吧，给你个小小的建议，朋友。如果你要从南门的迎宾机器人身边经过，一定要先和它们打声招呼。

ESP.ORIGINAL: VFSVaporizedTouristREF.enable set VFSOldBenREF.iStart to 1
{surprised to meet player here}How interesting! You're the Profligate courier who's been of some assistance to the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: {surprisedtomeetplayerhere}真有意思！你就是那个帮助过军团的邮差。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set vfreeformthefort.bmetvulpes to 1
{surprised to meet player here}How interesting! You're the Profligate courier who's been of some assistance to the Legion.
ESP.TRADUIT: {surprisedtomeetplayerhere}真有意思！你就是那个帮助过军团的邮差。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're not one of my regulars. What do you want?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你好像不是我的老主顾呀。你想要什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Whoa. New guy.
Whoa. New chick.
I haven't seen you before - what brings you to the Great Khans?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以前没见过你——是什么风把你吹到大汗帮来了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: set VMS45.bMetRegis to 1 if VMQYesMan02.VisitedRedRock == 0 set VMQYesMan02.VisitedRedRock to 1 if GetObjectiveDisplayed VMQYesMan02 40 == 1 SetObjectiveCompleted VMQYesMan02 40 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMQYesMan02 42 1 endif endif
I understand you dealt the NCR a crushing defeat at Forlorn Hope. I hope that trend continues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说你在飘零希望营地给了NCR致命的一击。我希望这个势头能保持下去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's why I've made a decision: I'm naming you my heir. When I die, leadership of the Great Khans will pass to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此，我决定：我将立你为我的继承人。一旦我死了，大汗帮的领导权将交给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted VMS45 85 1 Set VMS45.PlayerHeir to 1 if VMQYesMan02.VisitedRedRock == 0 set VMQYesMan02.VisitedRedRock to 1 if GetObjectiveDisplayed VMQYesMan02 40 == 1 SetObjectiveCompleted VMQYesMan02 40 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMQYesMan02 42 1 endif endif
Let me ask you a question - what's the tastiest thing you've ever eaten?
ESP.TRADUIT: 让我问你个问题——你吃过最好吃的东西是什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's close enough. What do you want with the Great Khans?
ESP.TRADUIT: 别再往前走了。你找大汗帮有什么事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice outfit, but I know you're not one of us. What do you want with the Great Khans?
ESP.TRADUIT: 行头不错，但我知道你不是我们的人。你找大汗帮有什么事？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I like you, stranger. You've stood by us when not many would.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我喜欢你，陌生人。在众人离弃我们的时候，你选择了和我们站在一起。

ESP.ORIGINAL: #1|You feel better after visiting with coyotes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和郊狼接触让你感觉好多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <bark!> {pups}
if player.IsSpellTargetAlt ALTCoyoteVisit == 0 player.cios ALTCoyoteVisit messageexalt 3 "#1|You feel better after visiting with coyotes." endif
#1|You feel better after visiting with coyotes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和郊狼接触让你感觉好多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <bark!> {happy}
if player.IsSpellTargetAlt ALTCoyoteVisit == 0 player.cios ALTCoyoteVisit messageexalt 3 "#1|You feel better after visiting with coyotes." endif
#1|You feel better after visiting with coyotes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和郊狼接触让你感觉好多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <panting>
if player.IsSpellTargetAlt ALTCoyoteVisit == 0 player.cios ALTCoyoteVisit messageexalt 3 "#1|You feel better after visiting with coyotes." endif
#1|You feel better after visiting with coyotes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和郊狼接触让你感觉好多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <bark!>
if player.IsSpellTargetAlt ALTCoyoteVisit == 0 player.cios ALTCoyoteVisit messageexalt 3 "#1|You feel better after visiting with coyotes." endif
#1|You feel better after visiting with coyotes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和郊狼接触让你感觉好多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <sniffing>
if player.IsSpellTargetAlt ALTCoyoteVisit == 0 player.cios ALTCoyoteVisit messageexalt 3 "#1|You feel better after visiting with coyotes." endif
ESP.TRADUIT: if player.IsSpellTargetAlt ALTCoyoteVisit == 0 player.cios ALTCoyoteVisit messageexalt 3 "和郊狼接触让你感觉好多了。" endif

ESP.ORIGINAL: Goodbye.
<bark! bark!>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_goodbye_00000e09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait here.
<bark!>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_followerswait_00000e07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set ALTDogMeatRef.Waiting to 1; ALTDogMeatRef.evp;
Stay, Dogmeat.
Let's trade equipment.
<bark!>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_followerstrade_00000e06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: OpenTeammateContainer
Enough about tactics.
<bark!>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_followerstacticsend_00000e05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your distance. Try to flank them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和他们保持距离。不妨从侧面攻击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <bark!>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_followerstacticsdista_00000e04_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set ALTDogMeatRef.IsFollowingDefault to 0 set ALTDogMeatRef.IsFollowingLong to 1 ALTDogMeatRef.evp
All right, you're good. Let's get out of here.
<bark!>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_followerstacticsdista_00000e1e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your distance is good. Let's talk about something else.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的距离不错。让我们谈谈其他事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <bark!>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_followerstacticsdista_00000e1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay close to me.
<bark!>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_followerstacticsdista_00000e03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set ALTDogMeatRef.IsFollowingDefault to 1 set ALTDogMeatRef.IsFollowingLong to 0 ALTDogMeatRef.evp
Let's talk about how close you're following me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们来讨论下你我之间的距离。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <pant pant>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_followerstacticsdista_00000e1c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about something else.
<bark!>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_followerstacticscomba_00000e19_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's all. Let's get going.
<bark!>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_followerstacticscomba_00000e1a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to change your combat style.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你改变你的战斗风格。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {questioning aroo}<aroo?>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_followerstacticscomba_00000e17_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's talk about your tactics.
{questioning aroo}<aroo?>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_followerstactics_00000e16_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get going.
<bark!> {happy}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_followersletsgo_00000e14_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set ALTDogMeatRef.Waiting to 0; ALTDogMeatRef.evp
Let's get going, Dogmeat.
It's time for us to part ways.
{sad whimper}<whimper>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_followersfired_00000e0d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we should travel together.
<bark! bark!>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_followershired_00000e13_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Set ALTDogMeatRef.Waiting to 0 Set ALTDogMeatRef.Fired to 0 SIFH 1 IgnoreCrime 1
set ALTDogMeatRef.IsFollowingLong to 0 player.addperk ALTDogmeatPerk showmessage ALTDogmeatPerkMSG ALTDogMeatRef.AddToFaction FollowerFaction 1 ALTDogMeatRef.SetPlayerTeammate 1 ALTDogMeatRef.SetFactionRank TeammateFaction 1 set ALTDogMeatRef.IsFollowingDefault to 1 set ALTDogMeatRef.CombatStyleMelee to 1 ALTDogMeatRef.evp
Come on, Dogmeat. It's time to get going.
We haven't met yet.
Oh, what am I doing? I got to thinking about making a good impression and plain forgot to tell you my name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，瞧我多失礼啊，净想着给你留个好印象，反倒忘了告诉你我的名字了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Surprise

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm Jeannie May. I take care of folks here at the motel. Long as they aren't troublemakers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是珍妮·梅。我负责照看汽车旅馆，确保住在里面的客人们不会惹麻烦。.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'm not from here.
No. No you're not, are you? Maybe you shouldn't go. Not just yet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，你不是。或许你不该走。至少不是现在。

ESP.ORIGINAL: HVRamosFanboy
You don't. Ever. You don't even think about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你永远也不可能加入，这事你就别考虑了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even if we did recruit trespassers, you're far too old for us. Your relationship to technology has already been perverted.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即便我们现在还招募外来者，你的年纪也太大了。你对科技的态度早就被外界的偏见所扭曲。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How do I join the Brotherhood of Steel?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我怎样才能加入钢铁兄弟会？

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想了一下，还是留在我身边吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {happy bark}<bark!>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_followersfiredno_00000e0e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I'm sure.
<whimper>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_followersfiredyes_00000e0f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
set ALTDogMeatRef.Waiting to 0 set ALTDogMeatRef.Fired to 1
ALTDogMeatRef.SetPlayerTeammate 0
player.removeperk ALTDogmeatPerk ALTDogMeatRef.RemoveFromFaction FollowerFaction
ShowMessage ALTDogmeatHomeMessage ALTDogMeatRef.ResetAI
ALTDogMeatRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade ALTDogMeatHome
That's some impressive weaponry. Where did it all come from?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些武器真是上乘啊，你从哪里弄来的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: All Gun Runner merchandise is constructed on-site.
ESP.TRADUIT: 枪支走私者的所有商品都在厂房内生产。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is this place?
This is the New Vegas branch of the Gun Runners, supplying the wasteland with only the finest armaments since 2155.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是枪支走私者的新维加斯分部，始于2155年，致力为废土提供最好的军火。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where's your boss? He'll want to know you were hitting me up for freebies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们老大在哪？我要告诉他，你想从我这儿揩油。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey! No need, no need! I was just kidding!
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿！别，别呀！我刚才开玩笑呢！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Motor-Runner's down in the Maintenance Wing. Straight through the door behind me, down the hall, down the stairs to the right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 轰鸣恶煞就在下面的维修区。直走穿过我身后的那扇门，经过大厅，再下楼梯右转就是了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was just kidding about tossing me some Psycho. So you don't got to say anything about that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刚才问你要疯狂药是开玩笑呢。你可千万不要乱说呀。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set VMS07.iVault3Entrance to 2 setAlly PlayerFaction FiendsFactionNV V3aToV3b.unlock
VMS07Greeting
This is what I've been waiting to see! A big bad Khan bringing in the medicine! How about you toss some Psycho my way?
ESP.TRADUIT: 终于盼来了！有个大汗帮的人带来了药！你能不能甩几支疯狂药给我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not a Khan. I'm just dressed like one.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不是大汗帮的人。只是穿得像而已。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then what the fuck are you doing here? You looking to get killed? What the fuck?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那你他妈的来这里做什么？找死啊？什么毛病？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just here looking around.
[FAILED] Then I think you'd better find your way out before you get yourself hurt.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 那我觉得你最好掉头回去，免得受伤。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] I guess it isn't a secret. Yeah, the residents of the Vault are all dead. We killed them.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 我想这也不是秘密了。没错，这座避难所里面的居民都被杀掉了，是我们干的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Funny thing is, they just let us in. We didn't have to force the doors or anything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好玩的是，他们居然就直接放我们进来了。都不用我们破门而入。

ESP.ORIGINAL: rewardxp 25
Can you tell me what happened to the residents here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能告诉我这里的居民发生了什么事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Doc Outro>
You should talk to Sunny Smiles before you leave town. She can help you learn to fend for yourself in the desert. She'll likely be at the saloon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在离开小镇之前，你应该去和微笑桑妮谈谈。她能教你如何在沙漠中生存。她应该就在酒吧里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Mitchell [00104C0C] (file) Quest : ([00104C1C]VCG01) Ain't That a Kick in the Head EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I reckon some of the other folks at the saloon might be able to help you out, too. And the metal fella, Victor, who pulled you outta your grave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想酒吧里其他人也能帮上你。还有把你从坟墓里拉出来的金属伙计，维克多。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Mitchell [00104C0C] (file) Quest : ([00104C1C]VCG01) Ain't That a Kick in the Head EmotionType : Happy

ESP.ORIGINAL: Anyway, you ever get hurt out there, you come right back. I'll fix you up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎样，如果你在外面受了伤，可以尽管回来找我。我会替你疗伤的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Mitchell [00104C0C] (file) Quest : ([00104C1C]VCG01) Ain't That a Kick in the Head EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: But try not to get killed anymore.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doc Mitchell [00104C0C] (file) Quest : ([00104C1C]VCG01) Ain't That a Kick in the Head EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about the people who attacked me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道朝我开枪的人是谁吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The one in the fancy suit seemed to be calling the shots, that's as much as I know. Other folks in town might know more.
ESP.TRADUIT: 穿高档西装的那个人看起来像是老大，我就知道这些。镇里的其他人可能会懂得更多。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Word of advice, though: if you ever catch up with him, watch out. The man's got cold eyes like a snake. Can't be trusted, I'd say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过还是给你个建议吧：如果你遇到他，一定多加小心。那个人的眼神就像毒蛇一样冰冷。要我说，绝对不能相信他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about the man that shot me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 朝我开枪的那个人，你知道些什么吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't see him or the men with him. You might ask around town, though. Could be someone saw which way they was headed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没见过他或者他的同伙。不过你可以去镇上问问，说不定会有人知道他们的去向。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your best bet would probably be Trudy, the bartender at the saloon up the road. If anyone saw anything, she'd know about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你最好先去问问特鲁迪，她是路边酒馆的调酒师。如果有人看见，她肯定会知道的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: VCG01DocMitchellWhoRescued
That'd be Victor. Curious fella. He's sort of odd. And I don't just mean 'cause he's a robot. I couldn't tell you much about him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就是维克多，奇怪的家伙，是那种怪人。不光因为他是个机器人我才这么说。关于他更多的事我也说不上来了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's real friendly, don't get me wrong. You just get the sense that ain't the whole picture. Just a feeling.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你别误会，他非常友好。但我总觉得他没那么简单。就是有种感觉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keeps to himself, mostly. You want to know more about him, you'll have to ask him yourself. He has a shack on the southern edge of town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大部分时间他都独来独往。如果你想了解他的情况，可以自己去问他。他在镇子的南边有个棚屋。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who was it that rescued me?
How did you happen to find me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么会碰巧找到我的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was out for a stroll that night when I heard the commotion up at the old bone orchard. Saw what looked like a bunch of bad eggs so I laid low.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那天晚上我在外面闲逛，听到墓地里有骚动。我过去一看，好像是一群坏蛋，于是我就埋低了身子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once they'd run off, I dug you up to see if you were still kicking. Turns out, you were, so I hauled you off to the Doc right quick.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们一跑掉，我就把你挖了出来，想知道你还有没有救。幸好你还有口气在，所以我就把你拖到了医生那里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ShowMap GoodspringsCemeteryMapMarker SetObjectiveCompleted VMQ01 25 1
Thanks for digging me out of that grave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你把我从那个坟里挖出来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Don't mention it! I'm always ready to lend a helping hand to a stranger in need.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不客气！我总是会对需要帮助的陌生人伸出援手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to get to Primm. Can you suggest a route?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要去普瑞姆。你可以给我指条路吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure can. Take the road southeast out of town till it hits the freeway. Primm is the town with the roller coaster, straight south. Can't miss it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然可以。沿着镇外东南边的路，一直走到高速公路。普瑞姆小镇上有一台过山车，就在正南边。你肯定能找得到

ESP.ORIGINAL: NCR patrols do a good job of keeping the highway clear, but I'd keep your gun where you can reach it easily. You never know who you'll run into.
ESP.TRADUIT: NCR的巡逻队把高速公路上的治安维持得挺不错，但我个人还是情愿把枪放在最顺手的地方。你永远想不到自己会遇到什么状况。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Off the road, you'll probably start running into hostile wildlife. My advice would be to stick to the highway when you can.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果离开大路的话，你可能会遇到充满敌意的野生动物。所以我的建议是尽量走高速公路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted VMQ01 15 1 ShowMap PrimmMapMarker
Do you know who those men were who attacked me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道那些袭击我的人是谁吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can't say that I'm familiar with the rascals. Some of the fine folks in town might be able to help you out with that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和那些恶棍可不熟。不过镇上的其他好心人也许能告诉你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about the people who attacked me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道是谁开枪打了我吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The leader was a New Vegas-type, typical city boy. He had a bunch of Great Khans with him, probably hired guns.
ESP.TRADUIT: 领头的是个新维加斯人，典型的城里小子。带了一群大汗帮的人，可能是他雇的枪手。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Great Khans normally stay in their own territory way up northwest, on account of them being enemies with the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 大汗帮的人一般都呆在西北边自己的领地里，因为他们现在正与NCR为敌。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Set VStoryEventKnowsKhansInvolved to 1;
set VFreeformGoodsprings.bChetMentionedNewVegas to 1
I'm trying to track down the people who attacked me. Know anything about them?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在追踪那些袭击我的人。你认识他们吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not much, other than they're a bunch of freeloaders who expected a few rounds on the house. I was able to get them to pay up, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一群想吃霸王餐的杂毛，除此之外我也知道得不多。不过我还是逼着他们结清了账。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, one of the Great Khans did knock my radio to the floor "by accident," and it hasn't been working since.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，有个大汗帮的人"不小心"把我的收音机摔到了地上，然后收音机就不能用了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set VFreeformGoodsprings.bKnowAboutRadio to 1 Set VStoryEventKnowsKhansInvolved to 1;
Do you know the robot that rescued me?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道救我的那个机器人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know that... thing... as much as anyone else around here. It mostly keeps to itself, which is just fine by me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个……玩意，我知道的也不比其他人多。它总是独来独往的，不过这样对我来说最好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Trudy [00104C6C] (file) Comment (NAM2) : "thing" said with a measure of disgust. EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Victor dead}Good riddance to it is all I have to say. Never liked having it around.
ESP.TRADUIT: 总算摆脱它了。我从来都不喜欢它。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Doc Mitchell said you could teach me to survive in the desert.
ESP.TRADUIT: 米切尔医生说你能教我沙漠求生技巧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I guess there's a thing or two I could show you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，我是可以教你一两样东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sunny Smiles [00104E84] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\femaleadult01default\altq_vfreeformgoodspringsg_000056a4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meet me outside, behind the saloon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来外面找我吧，就在酒馆后面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sunny Smiles [00104E84] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\femaleadult01default\altq_vfreeformgoodspringsg_000056a4_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Interested in sharing tips on surviving in the Mojave?
ESP.TRADUIT: 能分享点在莫哈维的生存技巧吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I guess there's a thing or two I could show you. Sounds like you need all the help you can get after what they done to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对，我是可以教你一两样东西。听起来你还是挺需要帮助的嘛，毕竟受了这样的打击。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Meet me outside, behind the saloon.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来外面找我吧，就在酒馆后面。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know anything about Victor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你了解关于维克多的事吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The machine? Harmless, no matter what Trudy says. She thinks it's hiding something, but I think it's just a broken down relic with no place to be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个机器人？我不管特鲁迪怎么说，反正我相信它是无害的。她觉得那家伙有鬼，不过我认为它就是个出了故障又无处可去的老古董罢了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why can't your men look into this?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不能派你自己的人去调查？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've tried, but he can smell a King a mile away. Probably knows all our faces by now. He's not a stupid man, I'll give him that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我试过了，但他大老远就能嗅出我们猫王帮的气味。也许他已经记住了我们每个人的长相。我必须承认，他并不蠢。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What I need is someone he won't recognize, which makes you perfect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要的是一个他不认识的人，而你是最佳人选。

ESP.ORIGINAL: So are you going to take the job or what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，这活你到底干不干？

ESP.ORIGINAL: FollowersAcknowledgeMyOrder
<bark!>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_followersacknowledgem_00000e0b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you not to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我没有动手，你也不要擅自攻击敌人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <bark!>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_followerstacticscomba_00000e1b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set ALTDogMeatRef.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 0
I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你看到敌人就马上攻击他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <bark!>
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_followerstacticscomba_00000e18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: set ALTDogMeatRef.FollowerSwitchAggressive to 1
I have some medical supplies to drop off.
It looks like you took care of our short term supply issues. In thanks, you can have a discount on medical services with me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看来你解决了我们短期物资供应的问题。为了表达谢意，你在我这里可以享受到医疗服务折扣。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Julie Farkas [0010C682] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\femaleadult11\altq_vfreeformfreesidevfsj_0000326b_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your work here in the Old Mormon Fort has been invaluable.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为摩门要塞所做的一切是无价的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Julie Farkas [0010C682] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\femaleadult11\altq_vfreeformfreesidevfsj_0000326b_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: As a representative of the Followers, I present you with your very own Lab Coat. Wear it well, and may it aid our cause.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我谨代表天启追随者向你赠送一件专属的实验室外套。希望你能好好珍惜，并为我们的事业做出积极的贡献。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Julie Farkas [0010C682] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\femaleadult11\altq_vfreeformfreesidevfsj_0000326b_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Also, before I forget, here is a key to a safehouse you can use to rest if you happen to be in the area. I'll just mark it mark it on your map.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有，差点忘了，这把钥匙可以打开我们的一间安全屋，如果你恰巧经过那附近，可以到里头休息。我会在地图上标记出它的地点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Julie Farkas [0010C682] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\femaleadult11\altq_vfreeformfreesidevfsj_0000326b_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set vfreeformfreeside.followersdrugrep to 3 set VFSJulieFarkasREF.iBarked to 2

rewardxp 300 player.addreputation RepNVFollowers 1 5 set VFSJulieFarkasREF.iServices to 2
player.additem OutfitFollowersDoctorUnique 1 player.additem SafehouseFollowersKey 1 showmap FoASafehouseMarker SetAlly playerfaction FollowersOfTheApocalypseFaction
Where can I find the rest of the Great Khans?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在哪可以找到大汗帮的其他人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our main camp is up in Red Rock Canyon, but we don't allow just anyone to come in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的大本营在红岩峡谷，不过那地方未经允许不得入内。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The NCR can't touch us there - too many places for us to ambush them. We see their scouts poking around once in a while, but they keep their distance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在那儿，NCR奈何不了我们——地形对我们有利，想伏击他们很容易。我们偶尔会看到他们的斥候在周围晃悠，但都离得很远。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: ShowMap RedRockCanyonMarker
I'm looking for some Great Khans who stole something from me in Goodsprings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找大汗帮的人，他们在清泉镇偷了我的东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The only Khans this far into NCR territory is me and my crew, and I didn't steal squat from you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和我的手下是目前唯一潜入NCR领地内的大汗帮成员，我可没偷你什么东西。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Besides, even if some of my gang did steal from you, I wouldn't rat them out. Loyalty actually means something to the Great Khans.
ESP.TRADUIT: 另外，即便我的人真偷了你的东西，我也不会把他们供出来的。对大汗帮来说，忠诚是很重要的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As far as I know, it's just me and my crew out here, and if it really was Great Khans who mugged you, they didn't come this way. I'd have seen them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 据我所知，这附近就只有我和我的手下，如果真有大汗帮的人劫了你的道，他们也没走这边。否则我早就看到他们了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are the Followers of the Apocalypse?
ESP.TRADUIT: 天启追随者都是些什么人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: We arose from the Boneyards of Adytum years ago. Since then, we have made it our mission to rebuild the wasteland and reeducate its inhabitants.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们数年前起源于内城的埋骨地。从那时起，我们就把重建废土和教化人民视为己任。

ESP.ORIGINAL: We hope to forge a brave new world free of war and poverty by sharing knowledge and resources. Our primary goal is the free exchange of ideas.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们希望通过知识和资源的共享，创建一个没有战争和贫穷的新世界。我们的主要目标是让人们的思想可以自由交换。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are you?
{Amused}You march all the way out to Red Rock Canyon, enter my home as bold as you please, and you have no idea who I am? You've got guts, I'll give you that.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Amused}你跑了那么远来红岩峡谷，肆无忌惮地闯进我家里，却不知道我是谁？你真有种，我很佩服。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, then, let me educate you: I am the chief of the Great Khans - the Khan of Khans, if you like. This is my tribe and these are my people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么我来告诉你吧：我是大汗帮的酋长——也可以说，是天之可汗。这是我的部落，而他们是我的子民。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Name's Regis - I'm Papa Khan's advisor and right-hand man. I'm also the chief enforcer of the tribe's laws - so watch your behavior.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫雷吉斯，我是父汗的顾问和左臂右膀，也是部落的首席执法官——所以你最好注意自己的言行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set VMS45.bKnowsRegisName to 1
That sounds wise. I wish you the best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来很明智。祝你们太平。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's why I've made a decision: I'm naming you my heir. When I die, leadership of the Great Khans will pass to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因此，我决定：我将立你为我的继承人。一旦我死了，大汗帮的领导权将交给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Papa Khan [00140E53] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleuniquepapakhan\altq_vms45vrrcpapakhantopi_00003b31_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Player.RemoveItem VRRCMongolsBook 1 SetObjectiveCompleted VMS45 55 1 SetObjectiveCompleted VMS45 59 1 if GetObjectiveDisplayed VMQYesMan02 42 == 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMQYesMan02 42 0 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMQYesMan02 48 1 endif SetStage VMS45 50 Set VMS45.PlayerHeir to 1
Thank you for hearing me out. I just want to do what's best for the tribe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你听我说这些，我只想为部族好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The grave.
Huh. Well, in that case I take it back. You look pretty good, given the circumstances.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈，既然这样，那我收回我的话。不过你的经历虽然惨，居然还是这样满面红光。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who's in charge of the Gun Runners?
Out here, we don't have bosses. Me, the gunsmiths, and the guards all know what we're supposed to be doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们没有老板。无论是我、枪械师傅、还是警卫，我们都各司其职。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Working for the Gun Runners is a sweet job. None of us would dare screw it up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为枪支走私者效命是一份美差。我们没人会自砸饭碗的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any chance I could get a tour of the Gun Runner factory?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我能有机会参观一下枪支走私者的工厂吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: None whatsoever. Everything inside the fence is off-limits, and the guards have strict orders to shoot to kill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不行。栅栏内是禁区，警卫们都有令在身，凡是擅闯者，格杀勿论。

ESP.ORIGINAL: A lot of our high-end weaponry comes from Pre-War military schematics. If our competition got a hold of them, it'd be bad for business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的武器制造工艺大多都来自于战前的军方图纸。如果让我们的竞争对手知晓，那会对我们的生意非常不利。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Who are the Gun Runners?
ESP.TRADUIT: 枪支走私者都是些什么人？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Makers of the finest high-grade weapons and ammunition in the wasteland.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是废土上最优秀的高档武器弹药制造商。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you ever get your hands on a piece of sweet, deadly hardware, there's a good chance that it came from one of our factories.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有用过保养良好、性能卓越的武器，那么十有八九都是由我们的工厂生产的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: NewsStory
A package courier found shot in the head near Goodsprings has reportedly regained consciousness and made a full recovery.
ESP.TRADUIT: 清泉镇附近被射伤的包裹邮差据报道已回复意识。现在正在接收康复治疗。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set RadioNewVegas.nStory to 1
What exactly is a Powder Ganger?
ESP.TRADUIT: 炸药帮到底是个什么帮派？

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's us. We got sent here to fix the rails and make some new ones, and for that we got to use dynamite.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们就是炸药帮。我们被派来修理和建造铁路，所以要用到炸药。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course, dynamite works pretty good against caravan guards, too. So, that's what we do - rob and blow things up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，炸药用来对付商队的警卫也很管用。所以我们专干这个，抢完东西后就把一切都炸上天。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is this place?
This? This is - or was - the big house. The New California Republic Correctional Facility. Not much "correcting" went on here, just slave labor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里？这儿是——或者曾经是——班房。新加州共和国劳改营。但几乎不存在什么"改造"，只有奴役劳工。

ESP.ORIGINAL: One day, us prisoners decided to liberate ourselves. Killed the warden, killed the guards, took over the whole damn territory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有一天，我们囚犯决定起义。我们杀死了监狱长和警卫，接管了这个该死的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: set VFreeformNCRCF.bKnowAboutPrisonBreak to 1
How did you all manage to escape?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你们大家是怎么逃跑的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: One night, there was a big explosion from the other cell block. I had no idea what was going on, so I took cover in my bunk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一天夜里，有个牢区突然发生了大爆炸，我不知道出了什么事，就躲到了床底下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: When it was all over, the guards were dead and we were free. Most of the other prisoners scattered, but a few of us stuck around, obviously.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等骚乱平息后，我们发现所有警卫都死了，我们自由了。大多数囚犯都逃走了，只有我们这一小部分人留了下来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like you to go back to the Lucky 38 for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你现在回幸运38赌场去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: <bark!> {happy}
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_followersfiredyessuit_00000e12_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL:
set ALTDogMeatRef.Waiting to 0 set ALTDogMeatRef.Fired to 1 set ALTDogMeatRef.L38 to 1
ALTDogMeatRef.SetPlayerTeammate 0
player.removeperk ALTDogmeatPerk ALTDogMeatRef.RemoveFromFaction FollowerFaction
ShowMessage ALTDogmeatL38Message ALTDogMeatRef.ResetAI
ALTDogMeatRef.MoveToMarkerWithFade L38SuiteCompanionMarker01REF
I'm a courier with the Mojave Express.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是莫哈维快递的一位邮差。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I don't got any work right now, sorry to say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在手头没什么活，抱歉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: {edited line}I'll tell you whatever I can. Do you have a delivery order you can show me?
ESP.TRADUIT: {edited line}我可以帮你想想办法。你有没有送货单让我看看？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I lost a package I was supposed to deliver.
FollowersOverburdened
{sad whimper}[Dogmeat is overburdened and is having difficulty keeping up with you.]
ESP.TRADUIT: {伤心的呜咽}[狗肉的负担超重了，跟不上你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dogmeat [0A00A6D6] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\robotuniquerex\altq_followersoverburdened_00000e15_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm looking for a man in a checkered coat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找一个穿着格子西装的人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure, I know him. What do you want with him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我认识那人。你找他干嘛？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This again? You gonna help me out with what I need, or not?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又来了？你到底想不想帮我？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now about the man I'm looking for...
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么关于我正在追踪的那个人…

ESP.ORIGINAL: Okay, I'll tell you everything I know, like I promised.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，就像我之前保证的那样，我会把我知道的都告诉你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: VMQ01MannyVargasAnswer
The guy you're looking for, Benny, he was traveling with some members from my old gang. They were going to Boulder City.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要找的那个家伙，本尼，他当时正和我老东家的几个哥们一起同行。他们要去巨石城。

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage VMQ01 50
I'm looking for a man in a checkered coat. Have you seen anyone like that?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在找一个穿格子西服的男人。你们见过类似的人吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, he might've been wearing a fancy outfit, but he wasn't any kind of gentleman to me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他穿的衣服确实很高档，可他看起来并不像是个绅士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Had his nose stuck so high in the air, you couldn't see it above the clouds. City folk, they always think they deserve better than what they got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他那盛气凌人的样子，感觉鼻子都快捅上天了。城里人嘛，总觉得自己能过上好日子是理所应当的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Those hoodlums he was with seemed to know Manny for some reason. He's our daytime sniper, up in the dinosaur's mouth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和他一起来的那些暴徒看起来认识曼尼。他是我们这儿的狙击手，白天会在恐龙嘴巴里执勤站岗。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Jeannie May Crawford [0008D749] (file) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted VMQ01 40 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMQ01 45 1
Can't say I have, but we usually keep to ourselves down here. You might have more luck up by the motel.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不敢说我见过，不过我们这儿的人都很低调。说不定你在旅馆能打听到什么消息。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe ask Jeannie May. Nothing happens in this town that she don't know about. She'll be up in the lobby, most days.
ESP.TRADUIT: 去问问珍妮·梅吧。镇子上的事就没有她不知道的。她白天应该都在大厅里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sure have. Camouflage, that coat was, trying to hide from extra terrestrials what can only see in black and white checkers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见过。迷彩，那件大衣肯定是迷彩，为的就是迷惑那些只能看得见黑白格子的普通人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But they're not fooled 'cause he forgot to put checkers on his face. I told him so and he seemed to take it to heart.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过谁也没被骗到，因为他脸上没格子啊。我跟他说过这事，不过他似乎没怎么放在心上。

ESP.ORIGINAL: They stayed here a night, and was up by the dinosaur talking to the sniper fella with the moustache a couple of times.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们在这儿呆了一整晚，还和恐龙嘴巴里一个留胡子的狙击手小伙聊了好一阵子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted VMQ01 40 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMQ01 45 1
Sure, but he didn't buy any souvenirs, if that's what you're wondering. Sounded like he didn't have his money with him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 见过，但是我可以告诉你，他一点纪念品也没买。听他意思是身上没带钱。

ESP.ORIGINAL: His friends seemed disappointed about it. Heck, I would be too, if I found such a fine store and left my money elsewhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他的朋友好像很失望。妈的，换成我也会失望，好不容易发现了这么一家好店，口袋里的钱却在别处花完了。.

ESP.ORIGINAL: Manny might know more about them. Thought he might've been friends with one or two of 'em. He's up in the dino mouth during the day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 曼尼可能知道得更多些。说不定他已经跟他们中的哪个人交上朋友了。白天的时候他一直呆在恐龙的嘴巴里。

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetObjectiveCompleted VMQ01 40 1 SetObjectiveDisplayed VMQ01 45 1
No, but I've been laid up for a while now. Haven't been able to keep an eye on things like usual.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我好长一段时间没出房门了。没留意到周围发生了什么事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a small town, though. I'm sure someone would've noticed somebody like that if they came this way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过镇子就这么大，如果真有外人经过的话，肯定会有人注意到的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've taken care of the Van Graffs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经摆平了范格拉夫家族。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well done. This is a small step in the right direction, but it's damn good to move forward again. Now, I believe congratulations are in order.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，虽然只是一小步，但起码我们是有所动作了。我必须要向你表示祝贺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Hardin [000E2F85] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult03\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_000094df_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It is my honor to bestow up on you the title of Paladin of the Brotherhood, for your meritorious service in its name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 鉴于你为兄弟会所做的贡献，我很荣幸地授予你兄弟会圣骑士称号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Hardin [000E2F85] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult03\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_000094df_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Normally, there'd be a ceremony and such, but everyone is too busy at the moment for such frivolity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常还要举行个仪式，但现在大家都忙得不可开交，实在是顾不得这些繁文缛节。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Hardin [000E2F85] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult03\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_000094df_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can give you this, however. Your very own suit of power armor. We can't spare our best, but I had the knights assemble this one for your use.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我还是要把这个交给你。你的专属动力装甲。虽然性能不算卓越，但为了能适合你，骑士们还是动了一番脑筋的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Hardin [000E2F85] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult03\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_000094df_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: In addition to the armor, I've given the order that all of our arms and equipment be made available for your purchase.
ESP.TRADUIT: 除了这身装甲，我还下令对你开放我们的军火库。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Hardin [000E2F85] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult03\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_000094df_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Finally, while you are now a member of the Brotherhood, I cannot ask any more of you. I'm sure you have goals of your own outside these walls.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后，既然你已经是钢铁兄弟会的一员了，我对你也没有别的要求了。相信你在外面还有未竟的目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Hardin [000E2F85] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult03\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_000094df_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are free to come and go as you please, though I hope you'll return to us someday in a more permanent capacity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在可以随意出入，但我希望有一天你能带着更加出众的本领回到我们身边。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Hardin [000E2F85] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult03\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_000094df_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish you the best, {outsider}outsid- {beat, catches himself}Brother.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你一路顺风，{outsider}外来… {beat, catches himself}兄弟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Hardin [000E2F85] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult03\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_000094df_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL:
; Complete objective SetObjectiveCompleted VMS55a 19 1
; Give player some power armor player.AddItemHealthPercent ArmorPowerT45d 1 0.10 player.AddItemHealthPercent ArmorPowerT45dHelmet 1 0.08
; Complete Hardin's quest SetStage VMS55a 100
; Open the store if not already open set VDialogueHiddenValley.HVStore to 1
set vDialogueHiddenValley.JoinedBrotherhood to 1
{Ask to join the Brotherhood}
Back when we were stationed at HELIOS, our scouts reported that a group was establishing itself in the area as a distributor of Pre-War weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当年我们还驻扎在太阳神电站的时候，斥候曾报告说附近有一伙人在贩卖战前武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Hardin [000E2F85] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult03\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_00008ee6_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Our Elder at the time, Elijah, was too concerned with getting HELIOS running and fending off the NCR, so he ordered us to leave them alone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当时我们的长老以利亚一心扑在太阳神电站上，成天想着如何让它运转，如何防止它落入NCR手中，所以他才命令我们不要理睬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Hardin [000E2F85] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult03\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_00008ee6_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's time that we correct that oversight, and show this region that the Brotherhood is still a force to be reckoned with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们必须纠正这个错误，让人知道兄弟会的力量依然不容小觑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Hardin [000E2F85] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult03\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_00008ee6_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to visit these weapons dealers, this Van Graff family, and make an example of them. Leave no one alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你去拜访一下这个所谓的范格拉夫家族，拿他们开刀。不要留活口。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Hardin [000E2F85] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult03\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_00008ee6_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: When the job is done, report back and I'll arrange for a team to clean up the site and retrieve the weapons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 事成之后再来向我复命。我会派小队前去清理尸体，回收武器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Head Paladin Hardin [000E2F85] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult03\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_00008ee6_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; Start quest to vanquish the Van Graffs SetStage VMS55a 10
Is there anything else I do to prove my loyalty to the Chapter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么能让我证明我对分部的忠诚？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I installed the device up at Black Mountain, as instructed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经依照你的吩咐在黑山顶上装了发射器。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, we've already started receiving telemetry from it. This will be a great help in our future efforts, and I thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我们已经接收到遥测信号了。这对我们今后的工作大有裨益，谢谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult01default\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_000088ed_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now then, it is my great honor to bestow upon you the title of Paladin of the Brotherhood, for meritorious service above and beyond the call of duty.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，我很荣幸地授予你兄弟会圣骑士的称号，以表彰你的卓越贡献，以及从中体现出的忠诚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult01default\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_000088ed_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid a formal ceremony was out of the question given our current state, but I hope this will make up for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕以我们目前的条件，没有办法为你举行正规的晋升仪式，不过希望这件东西能够弥补你的遗憾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult01default\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_000088ed_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I had the knights refurbish a suit of our power armor for your use. It's one of the earlier models, but it should serve you well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我让骑士们为你修整了一套动力装甲。这套的型号有些旧，不过性能依旧良好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult01default\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_000088ed_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've also given the order that all of our equipment be made available to you, not just the more mundane arms.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经下令开放所有装备供你使用，不再仅仅是日常军备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult01default\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_000088ed_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're a member of the Brotherhood now, and your gear should reflect that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你现在是兄弟会的一员了，今后也该穿得像我们一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult01default\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_000088ed_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lastly, you will be allowed to come and go as you please. You've done so much for us that to do otherwise would be a crime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后，你可以自由出入。你为我们做了这么多事，我们可不能亏待你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult01default\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_000088ed_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just ask that you keep the Brotherhood's interests at heart in all your dealings. Remember that you will always have a home here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只求今后你能时刻将兄弟会的利益铭记心上。记住，这里永远是你的家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult01default\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_000088ed_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL:
player.AddItemHealthPercent ArmorPowerT45d 1 0.10 player.AddItemHealthPercent ArmorPowerT45dHelmet 1 0.08 ; Complete McNamara's quest SetStage VMS55b 100
; Backup to enable store, just in case set VDialogueHiddenValley.HVStore to 1 set vDialogueHiddenValley.JoinedBrotherhood to 1
{Ask to join the Brotherhood}
As one of our patrols discovered, the mutants just to the northeast have become strangely violent in the years we were secluded.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们的巡逻队发现，东北方的变种人在我们隐居的这几年里变得异常凶猛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult01default\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_000088eb_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: However, this turn of events could also be an opportunity. We mostly left the equipment of the communications array there alone, out of respect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，这也可以视为契机。为了以防万一，我们曾将一整套通讯设备单独留在了那里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult01default\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_000088eb_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: As the inhabitants have now proven themselves hostile, no more respect will accorded them. Making their equipment fair game.
ESP.TRADUIT: 既然那里的居民已经不再友好，也就没必要对它们礼貌了。我们打算重新启用这套设备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult01default\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_000088eb_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to head up to the summit of Black Mountain and install this remote signal transmitter in one of their consoles.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你前往黑山山顶，在他们的控制台里装一个遥控信号发射机。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult01default\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_000088eb_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: It will allow us to tap into the radar and other detection systems running there, assuming they're still operational.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如此一来，只要那里的雷达与探测系统还能正常运转，我们就能和它们进行连接。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult01default\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_000088eb_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: If we're going to operate on the surface again, it would be nice to do so with as much information at our fingertips as possible. Good luck.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我们想重新在废土上有所作为，就必须尽量地搜集可用的情报。祝你好运。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult01default\altq_vdialoguehiddenvalley_000088eb_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: ; Start McNamara joining quest SetStage VMS55b 10
Is there anything else I do to prove my loyalty to the Chapter?
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有什么能让我证明我对分部的忠诚？

ESP.ORIGINAL: ALTStart
Great! I think you'll love it. Nothing better than a nice stroll through the Mojave desert, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 太棒了，我就知道你会感兴趣。没什么比得上在莫哈维沙漠穿梭，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojave Express Represenative [0A0016EE] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\altmojaverepvoice\altq_altstart_000016e9_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: As a new employee of the Mojave Express, you'll need to fill out some paperwork at our main office in the Hub.
ESP.TRADUIT: 作为莫哈维快递的新员工，这有些表格需要你填。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojave Express Represenative [0A0016EE] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\altmojaverepvoice\altq_altstart_000016e9_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But don't worry, in no time, you'll be back on the road. We have a lot of delivery orders to Vegas lined up for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别担心，要不了多久你就能启程了，我们有很多运单等着你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojave Express Represenative [0A0016EE] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\altmojaverepvoice\altq_altstart_000016e9_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can already think of one delivery order I think you'll be perfect for.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道有一件工作很适合你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojave Express Represenative [0A0016EE] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\altmojaverepvoice\altq_altstart_000016e9_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: disableplayercontrols imod FadeToBlack4sISFX set ALTGO to 1 callafterseconds 3 ({}=>call ALTStartUDF)
I'm interested in working for the Mojave Express.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有意为莫哈维快递工作。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ALTBio
Business in Vegas has really picked up recently, and we've got some orders lined up that require someone familiar with the area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在维加斯的生意最近正上升，我们堆积了许多运单需要熟悉当地的人来派送。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojave Express Represenative [0A0016EE] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\altmojaverepvoice\altq_altbio_000016eb_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid I can't say too much more, but our main office in the Hub will have more information for you if you're interested.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕我说不了太多，我们在哈伯城的总部会有更多你感兴趣的信息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojave Express Represenative [0A0016EE] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\altmojaverepvoice\altq_altbio_000016eb_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any delivery order in particular you got for me?
ALTBYE
Well I'll be here when you change your mind.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Mojave Express Represenative [0A0016EE] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\altmojaverepvoice\altq_altbye_000016ed_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not interested.
ALTBoSTop
Then allow me to explain our situation. This bunker is currently locked down, allowing no entry or exit, with you being one of the few exceptions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么请允许我解释一下目前的情况。地堡现在处于封锁状态，不允许出入，但你是例外。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult01default\altq_altbostop_00002908_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: In exceptional cases, teams are sent out to investigate sites or retrieve materials deemed too important to ignore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 特殊情况下，会派遣小队出去调查周边环境，或者寻找重要材料。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult01default\altq_altbostop_00002908_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Three such teams have gone missing recently, and the news of their disappearance has not yet been widely spread to avoid undue concern.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近，有三支小队失踪了，考虑到可能会引起骚动，我们没有公开这一消息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult01default\altq_altbostop_00002908_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: In order to maintain the peace, and adhere to the strictures of the lockdown, I need to send someone else to discover what happened to them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了维护稳定，确保封锁顺利进行，我必须派一个人去调查他们的下落。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult01default\altq_altbostop_00002908_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: SetStage VMS55 15 HVStripContainer.RemoveAllItems player 0 1 SetEnemy BrotherhoodSteelFaction PlayerFaction 1 1 EnablePlayerControls set VDialogueHiddenValley.HVState to 3 BunkerFirstDoor.unlock HVIntercomREF.SetDestroyed 0 HVCommandDoorREF.unlock HVEntryDoor.unlock HVDoorToCommandRoomsREF.unlock LockedOuterDoor.unlock LockedOuterDoor.SetOpenState 1 SetObjectiveCompleted VMS55 1 1 RamosREF.evp
My Chapter was lost, and I would like to join yours. I'm here to serve the Brotherhood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的分部毁灭了，我想要加入你们分部，为兄弟会做事。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ALTFoAHelios
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在他们的终端里找到了些加密的数据。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's reassuring. I'm a member of the Followers of the Apocalypse.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这我就放心了，我是天启追随者的一员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ignacio Rivas [000E07D4] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult08\altq_altfoahelios_0000387e_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: This installation carries with it dangers that no one here has realized.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没人意识到安装的危险。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ignacio Rivas [000E07D4] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult08\altq_altfoahelios_0000387e_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take care what you do here, and who you listen to. Some things are best left buried with the old world.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在这儿可得千万小心，无论你做什么，或是听谁的。有些东西，还是让它永远尘封于历史之中吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Ignacio Rivas [000E07D4] (file) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult08\altq_altfoahelios_0000387e_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: set VMS03.bKnowsIgnacioFollower to 1 set VMS03.bIgnacioTrust to 1
I'm with the Followers. My interest here is scientific.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和天启追随者是一起的，我只在乎科学。

ESP.ORIGINAL: ALTRegulatorTopic
ALTRegulatorConvo
Pleasure doing business with you.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Littlehorn & Associates Rep. [0A0068AF] (mod) NPC : Regulator [0A005CAE] (mod) Quest : ([0A0016E6]ALTQ) 0A0016E6 (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\altstart.esm\maleadult06\altq_altregulatorconvo_00005cb4_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ain't That a Kick in the Head
Walk to the Vit-o-matic Vigor Tester.
ESP.TRADUIT: 走到视动体能测试机旁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Use the Vit-o-matic Vigor Tester.
Sit down on the couch in Doc Mitchell's living room.
ESP.TRADUIT: 坐到米切尔医生的沙发上去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Follow Doc Mitchell to the exit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 跟随米切尔医生到出口。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Run Goodsprings Run
Kill Ringo.
(Optional) Shake down Chet for supplies.
(Optional) Obtain Doc Mitchell's spare medical supplies for the Powder Gangers.
ESP.TRADUIT: (可选)获得米切尔医生额外的治疗粉补给。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Defeat the Goodsprings militia.
ESP.TRADUIT: 打败进攻清泉镇的匪帮。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let Joe Cobb know once you're ready to take over Goodsprings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 让乔·科布知道你已经准备好接手清泉镇了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell Joe Cobb that Ringo is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉乔·科布林戈已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Plan your attack on Goodsprings with Joe Cobb.
ESP.TRADUIT: 和乔·科布一起组织对清泉镇的进攻。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hand the spare medical supplies over to Joe Cobb.
ESP.TRADUIT: 将多余的医疗物资交给乔·科布。

ESP.ORIGINAL: 1E Extra Characters - Fiends
Welcome To Fabulous New Vegas
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎来到魅力的新维加斯

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hood removed, Jessup waits to pistol whip
ESP.TRADUIT: 摘下兜帽，杰瑟普等着用手枪打你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jessup pistol whips the player
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰瑟普用手枪打了玩家。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yuma Flats
You just recently worked a shift.
Work a Shift
if player.isspelltargetalt ALTGunRunnerShift messageex "You just recently worked a shift." else call ALTGunRunnerShiftUDF endif
ESP.TRADUIT: if player.isspelltargetalt ALTGunRunnerShift messageex "你刚刚结束一次轮班、" else call ALTGunRunnerShiftUDF endif

ESP.ORIGINAL: Regulator
Contract Killer
Lone Companion
Although Dogmeat does not take up a companion slot, he deals extra damage and has a chance to knockdown opponents when he is the only companion in your party.
ESP.TRADUIT: 狗肉不会占用同伴槽，但当队伍中仅有狗肉一名同伴时，它能造成额外伤害并且有概率击倒敌人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Studying ants stimulates your mind!
ESP.TRADUIT: 研究蚂蚁使你头脑兴奋！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Myrmecologist
Study
